104b3('dul ba): rdzogs par byed pa la yang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ mkhan po ma mchis bzhin du dge slong dag gis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ de bsnyen par
104b4('dul ba): rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ bsnyen par ni/ rdzogs mod kyi/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dag ni/ 'das pa dang bcas par
104b5('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ mkhan po dang ldan par dge slong dag gis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ de bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes
104b6('dul ba): bgyi| u pa li/ bsnyen par yang rdzogs la bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa la yang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
104b7('dul ba): u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lo bdun lon la bya rog skrod nus na/ rab tu phyung zhig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ lo drug lon pa de yang dge
105a1('dul ba): 'dun gyi sko ser bya rog kyang skrod nus na/ de rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'am/ rab tu mi dbyung bar bgyi/ u pa li/ lo bdun lon par bya ba'i phyir te/ rab tu
105a2('dul ba): dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /btsun pa/ lo bdun ni lon la dge 'dun gyi sko sa nas bya rog skrod mi nus na/ de yang rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bya rog skrod nus par bya ba'i
105a3('dul ba): phyir te/ rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi'i nang na sgo thog ma'i mdo tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o// //mdor na/ bram ze dang yang nyin par dang / /dkor ba
105a4('dul ba): tshes grangs de bzhin te/ /lhag pa dag dang lo drug dang / /drug tu bya dang bcu bzhi dang / /shol ba'i zla bar sbyar ba ste/ /'dri ba rnams la'ang de bzhi bya/ /dge slong 'khod pa'i
105a5('dul ba): gnas na ni/ /bslab pa byin pas bklag par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe
105a6('dul ba): bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams dge slong gi gan du 'ongs nas 'phags pa/ de ring tshes grangs du zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ kye mi shes so/ /bram ze dang /
105a7('dul ba): khyim bdag gis smras pa/ mu stegs can gyis kyang tshes grangs dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma dang / yud tsam yang shes na/ khyed cag rab tu byung na/ tshes grangs tsam yang
105b1('dul ba): mi shes sam/ de dag lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
105b2('dul ba): lta bas na/ tshes grangs bgrang par ngas rjes su gnang ngo / /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong thams cad kyang bgrang ba la zhugs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
105b3('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad kyis ma bgrang par dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang / gtsug lag khang skyong gnyis kyis grongs
105b4('dul ba): shig / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang / khang skyong gnyis kyang ma dran nas de dag nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
105b5('dul ba): gsol pa dang / 'jim pa'i ri lu bco lnga byos la srad bu la brgyus te zhog la nyi ma re re zhing dran par gyis shig /srad bu 'phyongs par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od
105b6('dul ba): ma'i byang bu bco lnga byos la srad bu la brgyus te zhog la/ de las nyin gcig cing re re bzhin grongs shig ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong thams cad kyis de bzhin bgrangs
105b7('dul ba): pa dang / dran pa nyams par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis bgrang bar gyis shig /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis
106a1('dul ba): yang der 'ongs nas 'phags pa/ de ring tshes grangs du zhes dris pa dang / dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang / khang skyong gis
106a2('dul ba): shes so/ /der gtad pa dang de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci/ de dag khyed kyi tshes grangs kyi mdzod pa yin nam/ ci/ khyed la dris na/ ci'i phyir gzhan la gtod/
106a3('dul ba): khyed cag nyid kyis smros shig /de dag lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya zhing gtsug lag khang nas byung ste dong ngo / /de ltar
106a4('dul ba): gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de bas dge
106a5('dul ba): 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod par bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus kyi/ de ltar
106a6('dul ba): bas na/ dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod par gyis shig /ces bka' stsal pa dang /
106a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du chos grangs brjod kyi/ zla ba phyed po 'dzin par mi byed do/ /khyim bdag dang / bram ze dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed kyis zla
106b1('dul ba): ba byed po gzung ba yang mi shes te/ de ltar ma bzung na/ yar gyi zla ba phyed dang / mar gyi zla ba phyed po ji lta bur shes par 'gyur/ de dag lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /
106b2('dul ba): de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba phyed po zungs la tshes grangs brjod par bya'o/ /brjod pa ni/
106b3('dul ba): 'di bzhin du bya ste/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang / dge slong gcig gis rgan rim gyi dang por 'dug la rim gro dang bcas pas thal mo sbyar la tshig 'di skad
106b4('dul ba): du smros shig / de ring ni/ zla ba mar gyi tshes gcig ste/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang / lha rnams kyi phyir tshigs su bcad pa re re rjod cig /dge slong rnams kyis tshes
106b5('dul ba): grangs ni/ brjod kyi/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming nas ma smros pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming nas kyang brjod par
106b6('dul ba): bya'o| |'di skad du/ sbyin bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas sang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos la spyan drangs kyi/ de la btsun pa rnams kyis dge ba'i yid kyis brtse bar mdzod
106b7('dul ba): cig |gtsug lag khang gi bdag po la ji lta ba gzhan yang sbyin par byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po la yang dge ba'i yid kyis brtse bar mdzod cig /ji ltar dge ba'i yid kyis
107a1('dul ba): brtse bar mdzad pas na/ de'i dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/ 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gzhan yang de na rkyen du gnas
107a2('dul ba): pa'i sems can thams cad la yang so so'i ming nas brjod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis kyang tshig thams cad rdzogs pa'i rjes la so so nas tshigs su bcad pa re re
107a3('dul ba): lhogs shig / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag kyang der 'ongs nas 'phags pa/ de ring tshes du zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ kye de ring ni/ bco lnga'o/ /bram
107a4('dul ba): ze dang / khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi ni/ de ring bcu bzhi na/ khyed cag gi ji ltar na/ bco lnga/ ci khyed cag zhag 'dum
107a5('dul ba): par mi byed dam/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhag 'dum par yang byos shig /
107a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag 'dum par byos shig ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag zla ba phyed phyed cing zhag 'dum par byed do/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag
107a7('dul ba): yang der lhags nas 'phags pa/ de ring tshes grangs du zhes dris pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ kye de ring nged kyi bcu bzhi'o/ /de dag gis yang smras pa/
107b1('dul ba): 'phags pa/ de ring 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi bco lnga na/ khyed cag gi ji ltar bcu bzhi/ ci/ khyed cag zla ba phyed phyed cing zhag re 'dum par byed dam/ de dag gis smras
107b2('dul ba): pa| 'dum par byed do/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
107b3('dul ba): slong dag bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de lta bas na/ zla ba phyed phyed cing zhag 'dum par ma byed cig /dus gcig gi zla ba phyed dang gnyis 'das
107b4('dul ba): shing zhag 'dum par byos shig / de ltar na/ lo gcig la gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa ni/ drug go /de'i lhag ma rnams ni/ bco lnga'o/ /de nas yang bram ze dang / khyim bdag
107b5('dul ba): rnams lhags nas 'phags pa/ de ltar gyi zla ba 'di/ khyed kyi gang zhes dris pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ kye/ nged kyi ni/ dbyar zla tha chung ngo / /de dag gis smras
107b6('dul ba): pa| 'phags pa/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi ni/ zla ba 'di dbyar zla 'bring po na/ ji ltar khyed kyi dbyar zla tha chung / ci/ khyed kyis zla ba shol ba ma bor ram/ de dag gis
107b7('dul ba): smras pa/ ma bor ro/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag 'phya bar gyur na/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
108a1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus kyi/ de lta bas na/ zla bshol bor cig /bcom ldan 'das
108a2('dul ba): kyis zla bshol bor cig ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis lo re re zhing shol bor ro/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams yang der lhags nas 'phags pa/ da ltar gyi
108a3('dul ba): zla ba 'di khyed kyi gang zhes dris pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ kye/ nged cag gi da ltar ni/ dbyar zla 'bring po'o/ /de dag gis yang smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'jig rten
108a4('dul ba): pa thams cad kyi ni/ zla ba 'di dbyar zla tha chung na/ khyed cag gi ji ltar dbyar zla 'bring po/ ci/ khyed cag lo re re zhing shol 'dor ram/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'dor ro/ /
108a5('dul ba): bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag 'phya nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/
108a6('dul ba): khyim bdag dang / bram ze rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus kyi/ de lta bas na/ lo re re zhing zla ba shol ma 'dor bar lo drug drug cing shol por cig /lo drug lnga sum cu ste/ de lta bur
108a7('dul ba): zhag dang / zla ba phyed po dang / zla ba dang / lor bsgres na/ mnyam par 'gyur te/ mu stegs can gyis glags btsal kyang glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
108b1('dul ba): kyis lo drug drug cing shol por cig ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis lo drug drug cing zla ba shol 'dor ro/ /rgyal po dag ni/ lo gsum gsum zhing shol 'dor bar byed
108b2('dul ba): do| |dge slong dag gis de bzhin ma byas pa dang / blon po dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
108b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /blon po rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de lta bas na/ rgyal po'i gzhung bzhin du yang gyis shig /skar ma mi mthun par rgyu ste/ dge slong dag gis de lta bur
108b4('dul ba): mi sbyor ba dang / skar ma rtsi ba la mkhas pa dag dge slong rnams la 'phya nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
108b5('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong rnams/ skar ma rtsi ba dag 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ skar ma'i rjes su yang 'jug par byos shig /gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su
108b6('dul ba): bcas pa gnyis pa'o/ / //mdor na/ yongs su dag pa gnyis bya dang / /mtshams kyang rnam pa bzhir bya ste/ /de bzhin dad pa nam mkha' las/ /ma bkrol bar yang snga
108b7('dul ba): ma bzhin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
109a1('dul ba): zhus pa/ btsun pa/ mtshams kyi nang na mchis pas mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa rnams la yongs su dag pa stsal tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung
109a2('dul ba): ngo| |btsun pa/ mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa la yongs su dag pa stsal tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mtshams kyi nang na
109a3('dul ba): mchis pas mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa'i las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas mtshams kyi nang na mchis
109a4('dul ba): pa'i las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis bzhin du mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa rnams la las bgyir
109a5('dul ba): rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa rnams la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa
109a6('dul ba): li/ mi rung ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dad pa len pa'i dge slong gis dad pa blangs nas nam mkha' la mchis na/
109a7('dul ba): dad pa blangs pa zhes bgyi'am/ ma blangs pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ ma blangs pa ste/ gdod longs shig /btsun pa/ mtshams snga ma ma bkrol bar slad ma dgum du rung
109b1('dul ba): ngam| u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo dang po'i mdo sde'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po so gcig pa/ mdor na/
109b2('dul ba): bskor ba dang ni 'jig pa dang / /shing dang sa yi skye ba dang / /mi 'byung ba dang 'byung bar byed/ /'chi ba yang ni de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal
109b3('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ mtshams la mtshams kyis bskor du
109b4('dul ba): rung ngam/ u pa li/ dkyil 'khor dang / chus bskor ba dang / dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang ma gtogs par gzhan mi rung ngo / /mtshams la mtshams kyis gzhig tu rung ngam/
109b5('dul ba): u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ rnam pa dus mtshams 'jig par 'gyur/ u pa li/ lnga ste/ dge 'dun thams cad kyis bor te dong ba dang / dge 'dun thams cad mtshan
109b6('dul ba): 'phos pa dang / dge 'dun thams cad slar babs pa dang / dge 'dun thams cad dus byas pa dang / gsol ba'i las dang lnga'o/ /btsun pa/ shing gcig las gtsug lag khang
109b7('dul ba): gnyis kyi mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /de bzhin du gtsug lag khang gsum mam/ bzhi yang rung ste/ shing nyid ni/ gcal bar byos shig /sangs rgyas
110a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das ljongs ka shir spyad pa spyod pa na gnas gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum
110a2('dul ba): pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na 'od sngon po/ ser po/ dmar po/ dkar po rnams zhal nas byung ste/ kha cig ni/ 'og tu 'gro/ kha cig ni/ steng du 'gro/ 'og tu song ba de rnams ni/
110a3('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag po dang / kun dmyal dang / 'o dod 'don pa dang / 'o dod 'bod pa chen po dang / tshig pa dang / rab tu tshig pa dang / bstir
110a4('dul ba): med pa dang / chu bur dang / rgyun tu chu bur can dang / a ta ta dang / ha ha ba dang / hu hu ba dang / ut+pa la lta bu dang / pad+mo lta bu dang / pad+mo chen po lta bu rnams su phyin nas gang tsha
110a5('dul ba): ba'i sems can dmyal ba de dag la bab na bsil bar 'gyur/ grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba de dag la bab na dro bar 'gyur te/ des sems can dmyal ba de dag la gnod pa
110a6('dul ba): ni| bde ba'i khyad par du gyur pa dang / de dag 'di snyam du/ kye ci/ bdag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du bsam pa dang / de dag dad pa bskyed
110a7('dul ba): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa btang ngo / /de dag gis sprul pa mthong ba dang 'di snyam du/ kye/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang med/ gud du skyes pa yang ma
110b1('dul ba): yin gyi/ sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus na/ bdag cag gnod pa las khyad par du bde bar gyur to/ /snyam du bsam nas de dag sprul pa la sems dad par gyur pas na/ sems
110b2('dul ba): can dmyal ba'i gnod pa'i las med par gyur te/ gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du gyur pa der lha dang mi'i nang du mtshams 'dzin par gyur to/ /gang steng du song ba de ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha
110b3('dul ba): dang | sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs chen dang / snang
110b4('dul ba): ba dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang /
110b5('dul ba): mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi bar la sogs par song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par brjod
110b6('dul ba): cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod do/ /dbyung bar bya phyir brtsams par byos/ /sangs rgyas bstan la brtson par byos/ 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde rnams
110b7('dul ba): gzhom par byos/ /gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/ /chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/ /skye bo'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal tha mar 'byin par 'gyur/ /de des 'od zer des
111a1('dul ba): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bskor nas slar bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin du 'brang zhing dong ngo / /de ste bcom ldan 'das
111a2('dul ba): kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun du mi snang bar
111a3('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /byol song du skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang
111a4('dul ba): bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bus mo gnyis su mi snang bar
111a5('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed
111a6('dul ba): na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/
111a7('dul ba): zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed
111b1('dul ba): na ni/ gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang
111b2('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo gnyis sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kha dog sna tshogs du ma stong / /zhal nas byung ba mang po ste/ /phyogs kun des ni snang gyur pa/ /nyi ma ji
111b3('dul ba): ltar shar ba bzhin/ /tshigs su bcad de yang smras pa/ rgod dang zhum las rnam bral nga rgyal spangs/ /sangs rgyas skye bo mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/ /rkyen med dung dang pad+ma'i rtsa ltar dkar/ /rgyal
111b4('dul ba): ba dgra thul 'dzum pa ston mi mdzad/ /de tshe rang gis mkhyen cing blo brtan pa/ /rgyal dbang nyen pa thos su re ba rnams/ /thub pa'i khyu mchog brtan pa'i gsung rab kyis/ /the tshom skyes pa dge
111b5('dul ba): bas bsal bar mdzod/ /rgya mtsho las ni ri rgyal brtan pa bzhin/ /yang dag mgon rdzogs rgyu med 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pas gang phyir 'dzum pa nye bar bstan pa/ /de ni skye bo mang pos
111b6('dul ba): thos par 'tshal/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i
111b7('dul ba): rkyen gyis na/ 'dzum pa mdzad/ kun dga' bo/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /de ni/ de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu med rkyen med par
112a1('dul ba): 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung bzhugs nas chos bstan to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
112a2('dul ba): kun dga' bo rings shing myur bar stod g.yogs bzhi ltab tu bltab ste bting nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gdan bting ba 'di la bzhugs
112a3('dul ba): par gsol/ gnas 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang / da ltar gyi bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis bzhugs par 'gyur
112a4('dul ba): ro/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /legs so/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas ma smras par khyod kyis shes pa ni/
112a5('dul ba): legs so/ /zhes gsungs nas gdan bting ba de la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ phyogs 'di ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
112a6('dul ba): gi gtsug lag khang ngo / /'di ni/ 'chag sa'o/ /'di ni/ stegs bu'o/ /'di ni/ sgo khang ngo / /'di ni/ zhabs 'khru ba'i sa'o/ /'di ni/ bsro khang ngo / /'di ni/ rung ba'i khang pa'o/ /
112a7('dul ba): 'di ni/ dugs khang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rung ba'i sa zhes kyang bgyi/ mi rung ba'i sa zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa/
112b1('dul ba): ji tsam gyis na/ rung ba'i sar rig par bgyi/ u pa li/ dam pa'i chos yod pa'i tshe rung ba dang / mi rung bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos zhig par gyur na/ thams cad kyang rung ba'o/ /btsun pa/
112b2('dul ba): ji tsam gyis na/ dam pa'i chos mchis pa zhes bgyi/ ji tsam gyis na zhig pa zhes bgyi na/ u pa li/ ji srid du las byed cing nan tan byed pa yang yod pa'i bar du ste/ las byed la nan
112b3('dul ba): tan byed pa yang yod na dam pa'i chos yod pa zhes bya'o/ /las kyang mi byed la nan tan byed pa dag kyang med na/ de ni/ dam pa'i chos zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
112b4('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ mtshams kyi nang na rgyal ba bzhugs pa bzhin du las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /rgyal ba grangs su bskangs la las bgyir rung
112b5('dul ba): ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
112b6('dul ba): ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ mi bskyed pa'i mtshams bskyed rung du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ mtshams bskyed du mi rung ba zhes bgyi/ u
112b7('dul ba): pa li/ gsum gyis te/ dkyil 'khor dang / chus bskor ba dang / mtshams kyi nang ngo / /btsun pa/ klung 'bab pa'i pha rol tu mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo //
113a1('dul ba): de ste zam pa brtan pa zhig yod na/ rung ngo / /de ste btsun pa/ zam pa chad dam zhig par gyur na/ ji tsam gyis na/ mi 'jig pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li
113a2('dul ba): slar yang bcing bar bya ba'i sems yod na/ zhag bdun du 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis
113a3('dul ba): mtshams 'gum pa'i tshe/ las byed pa'i dge slong gum ste dus bgyis na/ bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ ma bkum pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ mtshan ma rnams brjod la las
113a4('dul ba): kyang mang du byas na/ bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /ldog pa ni/ ma bcad pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong ma'i mtshams gcod pa'i tshe las bgyid pa'i dge slong ma gum ste/ de dus bgyis na /
113a5('dul ba): bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ ma bkum pa zhes bgyi/ de ste u pa li/ mtshan ma rnams brjod la las kyang mang du byas na/ bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /ldog pa ni/ ma bcad pa zhes
113a6('dul ba): bya'o/ /gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo dang po'i mdo sde'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o/ /mdor na/ sa dang nam mkha' las bya ba/ /mtshams dang yongs su dag pa dang / /gnas gcig 'dug
113a7('dul ba): pa'i dge slong gis/ /las rnams kun la blta ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe sangs
113b1('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sa la mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /dad
113b2('dul ba): pa byin pa ni/ rung ste/ de ste sa la gnas pas grangs su tshang la sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la mchis pas rtsig pa la mchis pa dang lhan cig
113b3('dul ba): tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /dad pa byin pa ni/ rung ste/ de ste sa la gnas pa dag mang por tshang la rtsig pa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/ /sa la
113b4('dul ba): mchis pa dag gis shing la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /dad pa byin pa ni/ rung ste/ de ste sa la gnas pa dag mang por tshang la shing la gnas
113b5('dul ba): pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la mchis pa dag gis nam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun
113b6('dul ba): pa/ rtsig pa'i steng na mchis pa dag gis rtsig pa'i steng na mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /dad pa byin na/ rung ste/ de ste rtsig pa'i steng na
113b7('dul ba): gnas pa dag grangs su tshang la rtsig pa'i steng na gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ rtsig steng na mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig
114a1('dul ba): tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /dad pa byin na/ rung ste/ de ste rtsig pa'i steng na gnas pa dag gis grangs su tshang la sa la gnas pa rnams las
114a2('dul ba): dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ rtsig pa'i steng na mchis pa dag gis shing gi steng na mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /dad
114a3('dul ba): pa byin na/ rung ste/ de ste rtsig pa la gnas pa dag gis grangs su tshang la shing gi steng na gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ rtsig pa'i steng na
114a4('dul ba): mchis pa dag gis nam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ shing la mchis pa dag gis shing la mchis pa dag dang
114a5('dul ba): lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /dad pa byin na/ rung ste/ de ste shing la gnas pa dag grangs su bskangs la shing la gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs
114a6('dul ba): par gyur pa'o/ /shing la mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /dad pa byin na/ rung ste/ de ste shing la gnas pa
114a7('dul ba): dag gis grangs su bskangs la sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ shing la mchis pa dag gis rtsig pa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu
114b1('dul ba): las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /de ste shing las gnas pa dag gis grangs su bskangs la/ sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ shing la
114b2('dul ba): mchis pa dag gis nam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la mchis pa dag gis nam mkha' la mchis pa
114b3('dul ba): dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/
114b4('dul ba): mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la mchis pa dag gis rtsig pa la mchis pa dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la mchis pa dag gis shing
114b5('dul ba): la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba
114b6('dul ba): 'di'i dkyil 'khor las las brgya rtsa gcig tu gsungs pa/ btsun pa/ las brgya rtsa gcig pa de'i nang nas las dus na/ dad pa dang bcas par 'gyur/ dus na/ dad pa ma mchis par
114b7('dul ba): 'gyur/ u pa li/ thams cad kyang dad pa dang bcas pa ste/ mtshams bcad pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /btsun pa/ rdzu 'phrul lam sgyu mas mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ste/ de
115a1('dul ba): ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ rdzu 'phrul dang / sgyu ma ni/ tha snyad du gdags pa med do/ /btsun pa/ gza' dang / 'od zer dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma rnams
115a2('dul ba): kyis mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ gza' dang / 'od zer dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma rnams kyi mi brtan pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun
115a3('dul ba): pa/ chu rlabs kyis mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ chu rlabs ni/ mi brtan pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
115a4('dul ba): u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ yongs su dag pa len pa'i dge slong gis yongs su dag pa blangs nas steng gi nam mkha' las mchis na/ des yongs su dag pa blangs pa zhes bgyi'am/
115a5('dul ba): u pa li/ ma blangs pa ste/ gdod blang dgos so/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa gcig gis las kyi tshig kyang gcig /gsol pa yang gcig gis gnas gzhir sde bzhi la las
115a6('dul ba): bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ de ste gnas bzhir dge slong gsum gsum gnas la/ gsol ba dang las kyang mngon du gyur cing / der gsol ba byed pa'i dge slong gis
115a7('dul ba): gnas bzhi'i mtshams su sab mo'am/ re lde'am/ khri'am/ gzhan dag kyang rung / des mnan te de'i steng du 'dug nas las bya'o/ /las byed pa de nyid de dag gi grangs su skong ba'o/ /
115b1('dul ba): btsun pa/ dge slong gcig gis gnas gcig tu mchis la gnas bzhir las bgyid du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ de yang gnas bzhir 'di lta ste/ bsdigs pa'i las dang / smad pa
115b2('dul ba): dang / bskrad pa dang / slar bsdum pa dang / ma mthong ba'i phyir spang ba dang / slar las mi byed pas spang ba'i las dang / sdig pa la la lta ba slar ma btang bas spang ba'i las dang / chad pa'i las de
115b3('dul ba): rnams la mngon du gnas par gyur la/ las byed pa'i dge slong gnas bzhi'i mtshams sab mo'am/ re ldes mnan te 'dug pa'o/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// //
115b4('dul ba): mdor na/ phyed dang gsum las 'das pa dang / /phyed dang gsum yang ri yi steng / /dge 'dun bye ba skya rengs dang / /mtshams kyi nang du byin gyis brlabs/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du
115b5('dul ba): yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
115b6('dul ba): mtshams chen po chod cig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ mtshams chen po de'i tshad ji tsam lags/ u pa li/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum mo/ /btsun pa/ phyed dang gsum phan dang kyang mtshams
115b7('dul ba): zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad mtshams so/ /btsun pa/ 'og gi khams kyi mtshams gang lags/ u pa li/ ji tsam chu la thug par gyur pa'i bar
116a1('dul ba): du'o/ /btsun pa/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum las 'das te chu la thug par gyur na/ ci/ de yang mtshams zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /dpag tshad
116a2('dul ba): phyed dang gsum tshun chad ni mtshams yin gyi/ de phan chad ni/ mtshams ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ steng gi khams su mtshams gang / u pa li/ ji tsam shing gi rtse mo'am/ rtsig pa'i steng
116a3('dul ba): la thug par gyur ba'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum phan chad kyi shing gi rtse mo'am/ rtsig pa'i steng du gyur na/ ci/ de yang mtshams zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
116a4('dul ba): ma yin no/ /u pa li/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad ni/ mtshams so /de phan chad ni/ mtshams ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ ri'i mtshams gang / u pa li/ ji tsam chus bskor ba
116a5('dul ba): la thug pa'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum phan chad gcig tu chus bskor bar gyur na/ ci/ de yang mtshams zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /u pa li/
116a6('dul ba): dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad ni/ mtshams so/ /de phan chad ni/ mtshams ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun bye ste/ de na dge slong zhig zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs
116a7('dul ba): te| bdag chos la phyogs par bsam bzhin du chos ma lags pa'i phyogs kyi nang du mchis na/ dbyar chad pa zhes bgyi'am/ dbyar ma chad pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ de ste de dag gis lta
116b1('dul ba): ba la yang dad la/ der song nas skya rengs shar na/ dbyar chad pa zhes bya'o/ /de ste lta ba la yang ma dad la/ der song nas skya rengs ma shar na/ dbyar ma chad pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom
116b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dbyar tshul na gnas pa'i tshe dge slong gis zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi slad rol du song zhig ces gsungs na/ gang du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pa li/
116b3('dul ba): mtshams kyi nang du'o/ /ji lta bur bgyi/ dge slong gi mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ tshig 'di skad ces smros shig /dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes
116b4('dul ba): bgyi ba mtshams kyi nang gnas 'dir dbyar dang po'am/ tha ma yang rung ste/ tshul du zhugs pa las/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi don la mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi ba'i slad du
116b5('dul ba): zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag dbyar 'dir ro/ /bdag dbyar 'dir gnas so/ /zhes kun tu rgyas par bya ste/ snga ma bzhin no/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa
116b6('dul ba): drug pa'o/ / //mdor na/ sde lnga rnams te bsam bzhin du/ /kun rgyu gnyen la'ang de bzhin te/ /lung la the tshom byung ba dang / /ma thob phyir yang 'gro ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
116b7('dul ba): 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan
117a1('dul ba): 'das kyis dbyar tshul du 'jug par gyis shig / ces gsungs na/ gang dag tshul du 'jug par bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ rnam pa lnga ste/ dge slong dang / dge slong
117a2('dul ba): ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma'o/ /ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba thams cad kyang snga ma bzhin du'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun du byin
117a3('dul ba): gyis brlab par byas na/ dge bsnyen gyi don la mtshams kyi slad rol tu song zhig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste mu stegs can zhig mchis na/ de'i don la yang mchi bar bgyi'am/
117a4('dul ba): u pa li/ de ste sdig pa la lta ba de las 'bral bar 'dod na/ 'gro bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gnyen zhig mchis na/ de'i don la yang mchi bar bgyi'am/ 'gro bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge
117a5('dul ba): slong zhig gzhung la the tshom mam/ dogs pa zhig mchis na/ de yang mchi bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de yang 'gro bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis ma thob pa las thob pa'i slad du/
117a6('dul ba): ma chud pa las chud pa'i slad du/ mngon du ma bgyis pa las mngon du bgyi ba'i slad du the tshom mam/ dogs pa zhig mchis na/ de yang mchi bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de yang
117a7('dul ba): 'gro bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// //mdor na/ ma dras gos kyang de bzhin te/ /'on te grong du 'gro ba dang / /kun tu rgyu
117b1('dul ba): dang de bzhin pa/ /gtan la bab na gong lugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas
117b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ ma dras pa'i gos byin gyis brlab par rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung mod kyi/ rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na/ rung ngo / /
117b3('dul ba): btsun pa/ ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal nas grong du mchir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te khyim pa'i khyim du
117b4('dul ba): mchir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te khyim pa'i khyim du gnas su rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen
117b5('dul ba): gyis na/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te kun tu rgyu'i khyim du mchir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ ma dras pa'i
117b6('dul ba): gos 'tshal te kun tu rgyu ba'i gnas su mchi rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te slad rol du mchir rung ngam/
117b7('dul ba): u pa li/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na/ rung ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos khru tshad
118a1('dul ba): du byos shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ la la zhig khru thung zhing lus ring na/ des kyang khru tshad du bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ni/ khru tshad du bya ba ma yin gyi/ de'i
118a2('dul ba): lus kyi tshad du byos shig / btsun pa/ gang la thabs kyis chos gos mi langs na/ de ji ltar bgyi/ u pa li/ des gong lugs su gyis la chongs shig /gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i
118a3('dul ba): tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o/ / //mdor na/ lham la rnam pa lngar bya ste/ /seng+ge gcan gzan mi srun dang / /'dug par yang ni mi rung ste/ /pags pa la ni nyal mi
118a4('dul ba): bya'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
118a5('dul ba): zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba lang cang shes kyi pags pa las bgyis pa'i lham ma 'chang zhig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ci/ ba lang phal gyi pags pa la yang lham
118a6('dul ba): bgyis te 'chang bar mi bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de dag gi pags pa la yang lham byas te bcang bar mi bya'o/ /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag kyang sna stobs dang ldan pa/ so stobs
118a7('dul ba): dang ldan pa/ rkang stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rta cang shes kyi pags pa las bgyis pa'i lham ma 'chang zhig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ci/ rta phal gyi
118b1('dul ba): pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de'i pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ de dag kyang mgyogs pa dang ldan/ stobs dang ldan pa'i
118b2('dul ba): phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis seng+ge dang / /stag dang / gzig gi pags pa las bgyis pa'i lham ma 'chang zhig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ gcan gzan mi srun pa
118b3('dul ba): gzhan dag kyang mchis na/ de dag gi pags pa las bgyis pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de dag gi pags pa las lham byas pa yang ma 'chang zhig/ u pa li/ de
118b4('dul ba): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag kyang sen mo'i stobs dang ldan/ mche ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pags pa'i steng du ma 'dug ces gsungs na/ btsun
118b5('dul ba): pa| ji tsam gyis na/ pags pa'i steng du mchis pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ ji tsam rkub bzhag par gyur pas so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pags pa'i steng du ma nyal
118b6('dul ba): cig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ pags pa'i steng du nyal ba zhes bgyi/ de ni/ u pa li/ ji tsam 'phres par gyur pa'o/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su
118b7('dul ba): bcad pa dgu pa'o/ / //mdor na/ sha rjen dang ni rtsab mo dang / /yongs su btsags par gyur pa dang / /gzhang 'brum gcad par mi bya ste/ /gtsug lag khang dang bca' ba'o//
119a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
119a2('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong se ka ta bro 'tshal ba la sha rjen byin cig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ su las blang bar bgyi/ u
119a3('dul ba): pa li| de ni/ sha tshong pa rnam pa lnga las so/ /rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ shan pa dang / khyim bya gsod pa dang / ri bya gsod pa dang / phag gsod pa dang / ri dwags gsod pa rnams
119a4('dul ba): so| |'o na btsun pa/ sus blang zhing byin len bgyi/ u pa li/ dge bsnyen dad pas so/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de'i dus na dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas
119a5('dul ba): de sman pa'i drung du song ste nad med cig ces smras nas bzhin bzang / bdag nad 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig gis btab na/ dpyad cig ston cig /des 'phags pa/ mar 'thung zhig
119a6('dul ba): dang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / des bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / sman pas/ khyod kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin gyi/
119a7('dul ba): gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sman pas
119b1('dul ba): mar gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsgo na/ 'thung zhig/ dge slong des mar 'thungs na/ skom gyis gzir bar gyur te/ de sman pa la bzhin bzang / bdag ni/ skom pas gzir to/ /
119b2('dul ba): des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ rtsab mo skyur po 'thung zhig /des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i bza' ba ma gnang na/ ji ltar btung bar bya/ sman pas smras pa/ 'phags
119b3('dul ba): pa| khyod kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas gnang du gdan mi za'o/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
119b4('dul ba): pa| de ltar na/ rtsab mo skyur po 'thung zhig /ces rjes su gnang ba dang / dge slong dag gis rtsab mo skyur po ji ltar btung bar mi shes so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
119b5('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ rtsab mo skyur po ni/ rnam pa 'di lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'bras bu'i chang las tshwar gyur pa dang /
119b6('dul ba): 'bru'i chang las tshwar gyur pa dang / zho'i chu dang / dar ba dang / rtsab mo dang lnga'o/ /de las 'bras bu'i chang las tshwar gyur pa ni/ gang las 'bras bu rnams las byas pa dang ma rung ste skyur por gyur
119b7('dul ba): pa'o| |'bru'i chang las tshwar gyur pa ni/ gang 'bru rnams las sbyar nas ma rung ste skyur por gyur pa'o/ /zho'i chu ni/ zho las chu byung ba'o/ /dar ba'i khu ba ni/ dar ba zho'i chu lta bur gyur pa'o/ /rtsab mo
120a1('dul ba): ni| rtsab mo nyid yin no/ /de dag gi nang du chus bslad la ras kyi nang du btsags te ji ltar mda'i rgyu'i kha dog bzhin du gyur pa de ni/ dus dang / dus ma yin pa dang / na ba
120a2('dul ba): dang | mi na ba'i dge slong dag btung bar bya ste/ de la the tshom ni/ ma byed cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de'i tshe na dge slong gzhan zhig gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis btab nas
120a3('dul ba): des 'brum bu sen mos bcad pa dang / de slar sdug bsngal zhing rtsub pa/ tsha zhing gnod la na bar gyur pa dang / de sdug bsngal gyis rab tu gzir nas des 'di snyam du/ bdag la bcom
120a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal zhing dog pa dag tu gyur kyang ma dgongs snyam du bsam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen pos bskul nas de'i gnas su byon te dge slong ci
120a5('dul ba): nyes zhes smras pa dang / de snying rje zhing mi dga' nas mig mchi mas gang / mchi mas brnangs bzhin du tshig dal nas bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom
120a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ngas snga nas kyang gzhang 'brum ma gcod cig ces ma bsgos sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /'o na khyed kyis ci'i phyir de
120a7('dul ba): ltar byas/ bcom ldan 'das/ sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong 'di ni/ sdug
120b1('dul ba): bsngal gyis gzir bas na/ nyes pa med kyi/ ngas yang 'di ltar bsgo ba ni/ dge slong dag gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis gzir na/ sen mo la sogs pas bdag nyid kyis kyang ma gcod
120b2('dul ba): cig |gzhan yang gcod du ma gzhug cig / de la dpyad rnam pa gnyis su sbyar zhing bya ste/ sman dang / sngags kyis so/ /dge slong gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis gzir ba la sen mo la sogs
120b3('dul ba): pas bcad dam/ gcod du bcug na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong 'dabs tshong pa spu bu can zhes bya ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na khyim
120b4('dul ba): bdag gzhan zhig bdag nyid dad bdag nyid mos/ bdag nyid dga' nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin gang zag gcig pu la phul lo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan
120b5('dul ba): 'dzin ji srid cig gi bar du gtsug lag khang der gnas nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer te ljongs spyod du song ngo / /khyim bdag des 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin ji srid kyi bar du
120b6('dul ba): gtsug lag khang der gnas nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer te ljongs spyod du song ngo / /zhes thos so/ /de skad thos nas khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul lo/ /de
120b7('dul ba): nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin ji srid dga' ba'i bar du ljongs spyod nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer te shAkya'i grong 'dabs tshong pa spu bu can zhes bya ba gang na ba der spyod cing song ste/ mi
121a1('dul ba): bzhin du spyad pa spyod cing tshong pa spu bu can zhes bya bar phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la
121a2('dul ba): phul lo/ /zhes thos so/ /de skad thos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs
121a3('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'di na khyim bdag gzhan zhig bdag nyid dad/ bdag nyid mos/
121a4('dul ba): bdag nyid dga' nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te bdag gang zag gcig pu la stsal nas gtsug lag khang der bdag ji srid cig gi bar du mchis te lhung bzed dang /
121a5('dul ba): chos gos 'tshal nas ljongs spyod du mchis pa dang / khyim bdag des 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin gtsug lag khang der ji srid cig gi bar du 'dug nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos
121a6('dul ba): khyer te ljongs spyod du song ngo / /zhes thos so/ /de skad thos pa dang / khyim bdag des yang gtsug lag khang de de dge 'dun la phul na/ btsun pa/ de la bdag gis da ji ltar bgyi
121a7('dul ba): zhes gsol ba dang / sgra gcan 'dzin tshur shog /khyim bdag de gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang / khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smros shig /khyim bdag /bdag gis
121b1('dul ba): lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis nyes par gyur pa lta yod dam zhes smros shig /btsun pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te khyim bdag de
121b2('dul ba): gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag /bdag gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis nyes par gyur pa lta yod dam/ 'phags pa sgra
121b3('dul ba): gcan 'dzin gyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas cung zad tsam yang nongs par gyur pa ma mchis so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis khyim bdag de la legs par shin tu brtags
121b4('dul ba): shing smras te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas drung du phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag
121b5('dul ba): gis khyim bdag de la/ khyim bdag /bdag gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis cung zad tsam yang nyes par gyur pa lta yod dam zhes bgyis na/ de 'di skad ces/ 'phags pa sgra gcan
121b6('dul ba): 'dzin/ khyod kyis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas cung zad tsam yang nongs par bgyis pa ma mchis so/ /zhes mchi'o/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam
121b7('dul ba): logs la bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la bsil yab g.yob cing 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/ kun dga' bo/ song la shAkya'i
122a1('dul ba): grong 'dabs tshong pa spu bu can zhes bya ba na gnas shing 'khod pa'i dge slong thams cad 'dun khang du 'dus shig par sgos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / btsun pa/
122a2('dul ba): bka' bzhin du 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te shAkya'i grong 'dabs tshong pa spu bu can zhes bya ba na dge slong
122a3('dul ba): ji snyed gnas shing 'khod pa dag thams cad 'dun khang du bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
122a4('dul ba): 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus la bab par dgongs na/ shAkya'i grong 'dabs tshong pa spu bu can zhes bgyi ba na dge slong ji snyed gnas
122a5('dul ba): shing 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du 'dus nas mchis so/ /zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dun khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi
122a6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi mdun na gdan bting ba la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gang gis gang zag gcig la
122a7('dul ba): sbyin pa byin te/ gzhan la yang byin na/ chos ma yin par byin pa ste/ chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/ /mi rung bar spyod pa'o/ /gnyis las mang pa'am/ dge 'dun la byin na yang
122b1('dul ba): chos ma yin par byin pa'o/ /chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/ /mi rung bar spyod pa'o/ /dge slong dag /gang gis gang zag gnyis la sbyin pa byin pa gcig la byin nam/ gzhan la'am gnyis
122b2('dul ba): la'am/ mang po la'am/ dge 'dun la byin na/ chos ma yin par byin pa'o/ /chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/ /mi rung par spyod pa'o/ /dge slong dag /gang gis gang zag mang po la sbyin pa byin
122b3('dul ba): te| gcig la sbyin nam/ gnyis la'am/ mang po gzhan la'am/ dge 'dun la byin na/ chos ma yin par byin pa'o/ chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/ /mi rung bar spyod pa'o/ /dge 'dun
122b4('dul ba): la byin te gang zag gcig la byin nam/ gnyis la'am/ mang po la byin nam/ dge 'dun gzhan la byin na/ chos ma yin par byin pa'o/ /chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/ /mi rung par
122b5('dul ba): spyod pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dag bye ste phyogs dang / phyogs ma yin par gnas pa las/ phyogs gcig la sbyin pa byin pa de/ gzhan la byin na chos
122b6('dul ba): ma yin par byin pa'o/ /chos ma yin par blangs pa'o/ /mi rung bar spyod pa'o/ /dge slong dag /gang gis gang zag gcig la sbyin pa byin pa gzhan la ma byin na/ chos bzhin du byin
122b7('dul ba): pa'o| |chos bzhin du blangs pa'o/ /rung bar spyod pa'o/ /gnyis la ma yin/ mang po la ma yin/ dge 'dun la ma byin na/ chos bzhin du byin pa'o/ /chos bzhin du blangs pa'o/ /rung bar
123a1('dul ba): spyod pa'o/ /dge slong dag /gang gis gang zag gnyis la sbyin pa byin pa de/ gcig la ma yin/ gzhan la ma yin/ mang po la ma yin/ dge 'dun la
