123a6('dul ba): ma byin na/ chos bzhin du byin pa'o/ /chos bzhin du blangs pa'o/ /rung bar spyod pa'o/ /dge slong dag /rgyal po ni/ sa gzhi la dbang ngo / /bdag po ni/ mal stan la dbang ngo / /dge
123a7('dul ba): slong ni/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos la dbang ngo / /sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po ni/ bdag gis byin pa'i chos rnams la slar 'chos pa'i rigs kyi/ gzhan la sbyin par
123b1('dul ba): ni| ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /sbyin pa ni/ snga ma yin te/ phyi ma ni/ ma yin no/ /de bas na/ sgra gcan 'dzin la gtsug lag khang slar byin cig /dge slong dag /gang
123b2('dul ba): gis sbyin pa gzhan la byin pa de/ yang gzhan la byin na/ de lta bu'i rkyen ma gtogs te/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin la
123b3('dul ba): gtsug lag khang slar byin no/ / //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po so gnyis pa/ gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lo lnga pa dang / lo drug pa
123b4('dul ba): dang | gtsug lag khang gi dus ston dang / dus ston chen po dag byos shig ces gsungs pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis kyang de bzhin byed do/ /der yul so so na gnas
123b5('dul ba): pa'i dge slong dag kyang 'dus nas de dag la bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis bca' ba mang du byin pa dang / de dag gis cung zad cig zos nas lhag ma dge tshul pha dag la
123b6('dul ba): byin no/ /de dag gis kyang phyi de nyin dge slong de dag la de nyid byin len byas pa dang / de dag gis dge tshul pha dag la khyed cag gis bza' ba 'di gang nas 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /
123b7('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/ khyed cag gis bdag cag la khar stsang byin pa de nyid lags so/ /dge slong rnams nged kyis 'di khyed la byin pa yin no/ /zhes smras te the tshom du gyur nas mi
124a1('dul ba): len pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re ba yod bzhin du des byin
124a2('dul ba): la| re ba yod bzhin du slar zos na/ de dag gis byin na ni/ nyes byas te/ zos na/ ltung ba'o/ /re ba yod bzhin du des byin la/ re ba med bzhin du slar zos na/ de dag gis byin pa'i
124a3('dul ba): tshe ni| nyes byas/ zos na/ nyes pa med do/ /des re ba med bzhin du byin la/ re ba yod bzhin du zos na/ de dag gis byin pa'i tshe ni/ nyes pa med/ zos na/ ltung ba'o/ /re ba med
124a4('dul ba): bzhin du byin la/ re ba med bzhin du zos na/ de dag gis byin pa'i tshe yang nyes pa med la/ za ba'i tshe yang nyes pa med do/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa rdzogs
124a5('dul ba): te| sgo dang po rdzogs so/ / //mdor bsdus pa ste/ bsgo ba dang yang bsgrags pa dang / /ma bting ba yang de bzhin te/ /bslab pa byin dang las byed dang / /bzod par bya
124a6('dul ba): dang bskrad pa dang / /chos dang mnyam pa'i tshul bzhin te/ /rtsig pa chad pas gcad pa dang / /mdo rnams bsdus pa gnyis pa'o/ /mdor na/ bsgo ba dris la lan glon pa'i/ /dge slong
124a7('dul ba): pha ma dus 'das te/ /mnyan du yod na rtsod pa dang / /dge 'dun gnyis dang chos gos so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
124b1('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse/ dga' zhing yongs su spyod do/ /de rtse
124b2('dul ba): dga' zhing yongs su spyad pa las de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu pho zhig btsas te/ de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i
124b3('dul ba): btsas ston chen po rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags so/ /de dus phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas de yang dus phyi zhig nad kyis btab ste dus las 'das
124b4('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong dag gis de lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang bcas te dur khrod du bor bram ze dang / khyim bdag lam der byung ste dong ba de dag gis mthong nas de dag gcig la gcig
124b5('dul ba): gtam tu 'dzer cing 'dong ste/ kye/ bdag cag khyim pa khyim na gnas pas thabs rnam pa du mas nor rdzas dag bsgrubs kyang snod spyad dang / gos dag ni/ mi 'dor na/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu
124b6('dul ba): 'di dag ni/ sgo'i them pa brgya brgal zhing dka' bzhin du lto 'gengs shing bsod snyoms sgrub na/ ci'i phyir lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'dor zhes smra ba na/ dge slong dag kyang de'i mdun
124b7('dul ba): nas tshur 'ongs pa dang / de dag gis de dag la smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag cag khyim pa khyim na gnas te thabs rnam pa du mas nor rdzas bsgrubs kyang snod spyad dang / gos mi 'dor na/
125a1('dul ba): khyed cag sgo'i them pa brgya brgal zhing dka' bzhin du lto 'gengs pa'i bsod snyoms bsgrubs te lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'di ga las 'ong na/ de
125a2('dul ba): ci'i phyir khyed kyis dge slong 'di'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos su bcas te dur khrod du bor zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / de
125a3('dul ba): dag cang mi zer bar dong ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhung
125a4('dul ba): bzed dang / chos gos su bcas te ma dor cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed dang / chos gos su bcas te ma dor cig /ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis gcer
125a5('dul ba): bur bor nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcer bur ma dor bar smad g.yogs dang / rdul gzan gyis dkris te 'or cig /de nas dge slong dag gis gos bzang
125a6('dul ba): po bor nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang po dang ma dor cig / ces bka' stsal pa dang / de dag gis ngan pa dang por ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ngan pa dang yang ma dor bar 'bring
125a7('dul ba): po dang 'or cig / ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed dang / chos gos su bcas te ma dor cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba
125b1('dul ba): mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gang phongs pa de la byin cig ces bka' stsal to/ /drug sde dag rtag tu phongs pa ltar byed na bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag
125b2('dul ba): la ma sbyin par ji ltar rgan rim bzhin du byin cig/ ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsar bu dag ma thob par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dris pa la lan 'debs pa'i dge slong gis
125b3('dul ba): dge 'dun la bsgos la dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang / gtsug lag khang skyong gis dge 'dun gyi nang du rin thang bskyed par byos shig/ ces bka' stsal
125b4('dul ba): to| |gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na dge slong gzhan zhig dus 'das nas de'i lhung bzed chos gos dang / dge slong ma zhig gi lag tu bzhag go /dge slong
125b5('dul ba): dag gis de'i ro bsregs nas slar gtsug lag khang du phyin nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos dag btsal na ma rnyed de/ de dag gis dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang na dge slong ma ming
125b6('dul ba): 'di zhes bya ba zhig la yod par shes nas de dag dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du dong ste/ 'phags ma/ dge slong 'di zhes bya ba dus 'das pa de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos
125b7('dul ba): 'di na gtams shing 'dug pa de tshur byin cig / ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ dge slong de gang du dus 'das/ nges kyi gtsug lag khang du dus 'das so/ /'phags
126a1('dul ba): pa/ khyed kyi de na mchis pa ni/ khyed dbang / bdag cag gi de na mchis pa ni/ bdag cag dbang ngo / /ji ltar zhe na/ de bdag cag gi yang chos kyi ming po
126a2('dul ba): lags so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gi lhung bzed dang / chos gos ni/ dge slong
126a3('dul ba): dag dbang gi / dge slong ma dag ma 'chang zhig ces bka' stsal to/ /mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma gzhan zhig dus 'das nas de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos dge slong zhig la
126a4('dul ba): bzhag go / dge slong ma rnams kyis de'i ro bsregs nas dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du slar lhags te lhung bzed dang / chos gos btsal na ma rnyed nas gtsug lag khang zhig na dge
126a5('dul ba): slong ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig la yod par shes nas de dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te dge slong dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa/ dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
126a6('dul ba): dus 'das te/ de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'di na mchis na/ de bdag cag 'tshal gyi/ slar stsol cig /ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ dge slong de gang du dus 'das/ bdag
126a7('dul ba): cag gi dbyar mo khang du dus 'das so/ /de ltar na/ 'phags ma khyed kyi de na 'dug pa ni/ khyed dbang mod/ nged kyi de na yod pa ni/ nged dbang ba ste/ de'ang nged kyi chos kyi sring mo yin
126b1('dul ba): no| |zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de ste dge slong
126b2('dul ba): ma'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos yin na/ de dge slong ma dag gi yin te/ dge slong ma dag dbang bas na/ dge slong dag ma 'chang zhig /ces bka' stsal to/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod
126b3('dul ba): pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na dge slong gzhan zhig ljongs spyod pa spyod cing ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas de khyim pa'i khyim zhig tu dus 'das te/ de des dur khrod du bor nas lhung
126b4('dul ba): bzed dang / chos gos sbas te bzhag go /dus phyi zhig na dge slong ma mang zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod cing ri brag gi grong der phyin pa dang / khyim bdag des de dag mthong ste/ 'phags ma/
126b5('dul ba): bdag gi khyim du dge slong dus 'das pa'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'di lags kyi/ snoms shig /ces smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag /'di ni/ bcom ldan
126b6('dul ba): 'das kyis ma gnang bas dge slong dbang ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras so/ /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
126b7('dul ba): kyis| gang na dge slong med pa de dag tu ni/ dge slong ma dag blang bar bya ste/ de la the tshom ma byed cig /ces bka' stsal to/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod par
127a1('dul ba): dge slong ma mang zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod cing dong ba na/ de dag las dge slong ma zhig na bar gyur nas de dal bus 'gro zhing phyi nas 'ongs pa la des lam
127a2('dul ba): stor te ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas de khyim pa'i khyim du dus 'das so/ /des de dur khrod du bor nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos sbas te bzhag go /de nas dus phyi zhig
127a3('dul ba): na dge slong mang zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod cing ri brag gi grong der phyin pa dang / khyim bdag des de dag mthong nas 'phags pa dag /bdag gi khyim du dge slong ma zhig dus 'das te/ des
127a4('dul ba): de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'di lags kyi/ snoms shig /ces smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ste/ 'di dag ni/ dge slong ma
127a5('dul ba): dbang ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gang na dge slong ma med pa der ni/ dge slong rnams kyis blang bar
127a6('dul ba): bya ste| de la the tshom ma byed cig / ces bka' stsal to/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge
127a7('dul ba): slong zhig dus 'das te de dbang ba'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyim pa'i de na mchis na/ de gang dbang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gang der sngar 'ongs pa dbang ngo / /zhes bka'
127b1('dul ba): stsal to/ /gnyis mchis na/ gang dbang / gang sngar blangs pa'i/ gnyis kas blangs na/ gang dbang / gang gis sngar thob pa'o/ /gnyis kas thob na/ gnyis ka dbang ngo / /de ste gnyis
127b2('dul ba): kas thob na/ gang la khyim gyi bdag po dad de phyin pa de dbang ngo / /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de'i tshe na dze ta'i tshal na dge slong gnyis shig 'thab par gyur te/ dge slong gzhan
127b3('dul ba): dag gis bskor cing 'khod do/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis 'phags pa/ bdag cag gis khyim pa 'thab pa dag mthong yang bdag cag gis gcugs par
127b4('dul ba): byin/ khyed cag gis ci 'di mi gcugs par bskor te 'khod dam zhes smras pa dang / de na gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag nyid 'thab mo byed pa yin na/ ci'i phyir gcugs zhes smras
127b5('dul ba): pa dang / de dag la lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bskor cing ma 'khod
127b6('dul ba): par gcugs par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de dag gcugs kyang gtong du ma btub nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
127b7('dul ba): 'das kyis/ de ste gcugs kyang ma btub na/ spang ba'i las byos shig /ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis spang ba'i las byos shig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dus phyi zhig
128a1('dul ba): na dge slong gnyis shig nges pa'i gtam byed do/ /de gnyis na re/ 'di ni/ 'thob pa'o/ /'di ni/ 'thob pa'o/ /zhes nges pa'i gtam smra ba na gcig la
128a2('dul ba): gcig ngag rtsub po smras pa dang / de gnyis kyang dge slong dag gis spang ba'i las byas nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag cag ni/ nges pa'i gtam smra ba na
128a3('dul ba): gcig la gcig ngag rtsub por smras su zad na/ ci'i phyir khyed kyis nged gnyis la spang ba'i las kyis bcad ces smras pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan
128a4('dul ba): 'das kyis 'thab pa rnams la spang ba'i las byos shig / ces gsungs pas na/ nged kyis khyed gnyis la spang ba'i las byas so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod
128a5('dul ba): do| |de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de gnyis la spang ba'i las mi bya bar gcugs par byos shig/
128a6('dul ba): de ste gnas 'cha' ba zhig na ni/ de'i mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyis skos shig /de ste rgan pa zhig na ni/ de la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus la rtsod pa zhi bar byos shig /de ste des
128a7('dul ba): kyang ma slon na/ gdod de gnyis la spang ba'i las byos shig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/
128b1('dul ba): mtshams kyi bar du dge slong zhig dus 'das na/ gum pa de'i yo byad rnams su dbang bar 'gyur/ u pa li/ de ni/ mgo gang logs su bor ba'o/ /btsun pa/ gnyis kar mgo bor na/ gang
128b2('dul ba): dbang bar 'gyur/ u pa li/ de gnyis ka'o/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa ste/ tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o// //mdor na/ bsgrag par bya dang shing rta dang / /de nas phreng ba gos rnams dang / /dge
128b3('dul ba): 'dun gos kyang de bzhin te/ /the tshom so so'i skye bo'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan du yod pa na ya mtshan can du
128b4('dul ba): ma gnas shing 'khod do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par byon pa de'i tshe na mu stegs can rnams kyi mthu nyams nas rnyed pa chung bar gyur te/ de dag gis ji tsam 'dod pa blangs nas
128b5('dul ba): mu stegs su bya ba bya bar brtsams pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pa chos kyis nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /ji tsam dus phyi zhig na khyim
128b6('dul ba): bdag mgon med pa la zas sbyin chos kyis nang par sngar langs nas dze ta'i tshal du song ba dang / mu stegs can dag ci 'dod pa blangs te/ de dag gis de yang dag par bskul nas des
128b7('dul ba): bsam pa/ 'di dag ni/ ngan du smra ba'i chos dang / 'dul ba'i mu stegs can dag ste/ ci 'dod pa dag blangs te mu stegs can gyi bya ba byed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde de
129a1('dul ba): dang de dag las ma dad pa dag ni/ dad pa phun sum tshogs par yang dag par bskul bar byos shig /dgod par byos shig ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan
129a2('dul ba): 'das kyis rjes su gnang na ni/ bdag gis skye bo mang po dag kyang dge 'dun la yon dbul ba la rab tu dgod do/ /snyam du bsam nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas
129a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
129a4('dul ba): skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ ngan du smra ba'i chos dang / 'dul ba'i mu stegs can 'di dag ci 'dod pa blangs nas mu stegs su bgyi ba bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni/
129a5('dul ba): de dang / de dag tu zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun la yon dbul bar dgod do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na/ ngas khyim bdag rjes su
129a6('dul ba): gnang gi / ci 'dod pa blangs te sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba byos shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis ci 'dod pa blangs te sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la
129a7('dul ba): bya ba byos shig ces bka' stsal na/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis yang dag par bskul bar brtsams pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis 'phags pa dag kyang
129b1('dul ba): yang dag par bskul na ni/ bdag cag la bsod nams de bas kyang rab tu mang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis kyang
129b2('dul ba): grogs gyis shig / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis/ de ste bdag cag gi ming nas kyang brjod na ni/ legs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag
129b3('dul ba): gi ming nas brjod par byos shig / ces bka' stsal pa dang / khyim bdag gis kyang brjod par byas nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis/ de ste 'phags pa dag gis brjod na ni/
129b4('dul ba): bdag cag la de bas kyang bsod nams mang du 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis kyang brjod par byos shig /bram ze dang / khyim
129b5('dul ba): bdag gis gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang du yang brjod par byos shig /ces bka' stsal to/ /rjod par byed pa de skye bo mang po dag
129b6('dul ba): gis bskor nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shing rta'i steng du 'dzegs la rjod cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / tsha ba dang / char pa dang / rlung rnams byung bar gyur
129b7('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khang bu brtsegs ma byos shig / ces bka' stsal to/ /skye bo mang po dag gis sgo bsgribs pas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo bzhi thod la
130a1('dul ba): rjod pa yang bzhi zhog cig / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pa ci 'dod pa blangs nas gos zung mang po/ gos zung brgya stong mang po rnams
130a2('dul ba): gsog pa dang / des 'di snyam du/ gos mang zhig tshogs kyi/ da ni/ bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bshos gsol la/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa
130a3('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun rgan rim du yon dbul lo/ /snyam du bsam nas des dze ta'i tshal gos sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ gos kyi phreng bas sa steng kun tu sbyangs nas srung ma yang bzhag ste
130a4('dul ba): mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / phu nu dag kyang mgron du bos so/ /de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' bdag sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun du
130a5('dul ba): bcas te dze ta'i tshal du bshos la spyan drangs so/ /de nang par sngar langs te gdan bting nas bum pa chus bkang ste bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas
130a6('dul ba): te bshos gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la/ btsun pa/ 'jig rten na yon gnas du mchis ces zhus pa dang / khyim bdag /gnyis te/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa'o/ /de la yang khyim
130a7('dul ba): bdag / slob pa la rnam pa bco brgyad yod do/ /mi slob pa la rnam pa dgu'o/ /slob pa rnam pa bco brgyad po gang zhe na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
130b1('dul ba): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
130b2('dul ba): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / dad pas rnam par grol ba dang / lta ba thob pa dang / gong nas gong du
130b3('dul ba): 'gro ba dang / tshe gcig gis thogs pa dang / bar du mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / skyes ma thag tu mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las
130b4('dul ba): 'da' ba dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gong du 'pho ba rnams te/ 'di dag ni/ slob pa bco brgyad ces bya'o/ /mi slob pa dgu gang zhe na/ chos
130b5('dul ba): bsgribs pa dang / chos ma bsgribs pa dang / gsang ba'i chos dang / rjes su srung ba'i chos dang / mi g.yo bar 'dug pa dang / so sor rtogs nas skal ba can du mi 'gyur ba dang / mi bskyod
130b6('dul ba): pa'i chos dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba dang / gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba 'di dag ni/ mi slob pa dgu zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs so/ /bde bar gshegs
130b7('dul ba): pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas yang gsungs pa/ lus dang ngag yid drang por gyur pa yi/ /slob dang mi slob 'jig rten 'di na bzhugs/ /de dag sbyin zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/ /mchod
131a1('dul ba): pa'i zhing rab der byin 'bras bu che/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pa rgan rim gyi mdun du 'dug ste rjed pa bskos nas 'phags pa/ brjod
131a2('dul ba): pa'i tshe 'di skad du/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la sbyin par rigs pa/ rab tu sbyin par rigs pa/ thal mo sbyar bar rigs pa/ phyag bya bar rigs pa/ bla na
131a3('dul ba): med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag la gos rnyed pa 'di dag 'bul gyi/ ci bder bzhes shig /ces gsungs shig /de nas dge slong
131a4('dul ba): rjod par byed pa des rgan rim gyi mdun du 'dug la 'di skad du/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun sbyin par rigs pa/ rab
131a5('dul ba): tu sbyin par rigs pa/ thal mo sbyar bar rigs pa/ phyag bya bar rigs pa/ bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gang yin pa de dag la gos rnyed pa 'di
131a6('dul ba): dag 'bul gyi/ ci bde bar bzhes shig ces brjod do/ /de nas dge slong 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ 'di snyam du
131a7('dul ba): gyur to/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni/ 'di skad du brjod de/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun sbyin par rigs pa/ rab tu sbyin par rigs pa/ thal mo
131b1('dul ba): sbyar bar rigs pa/ phyag bya bar rigs pa/ bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi yon gnas de dag la gos rnyed pa rnams 'bul gyi/ ci bder bzhes shig /ces brjod
131b2('dul ba): de| bdag cag ni/ bla na med pa yin pas na/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa 'di dbang mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag /khyed kyis dge ba rnams ni/ bcab par bya'o/ /sdig pa
131b3('dul ba): rnams bsgrag par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ bdag cag gos rnyed pa'i phyir bdag nyid brjod pa lta ga la rung / bdag cag ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang
131b4('dul ba): bral ba'o/ /zhes smras te cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /kun tu sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du/ bla na med pa la bsdos pas na/ bdag cag ni/ kun tu sbyor
131b5('dul ba): ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa yin pas bdag cag ni/ mi dbang ngo / /snyam du bsam nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /bcing pa thams cad kyis bcings pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ 'di snyam du/ bla na
131b6('dul ba): med pa la de dbul lo/ /snyam du bsam nas de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /kun tu sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dag kyang cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /bdag cag ni/ bcing ba thams cad
131b7('dul ba): kyis bcings pas na/ bdag cag ni/ thams cad kyi thams cad du mi dbang ngo / /snyam du bsam nas de dag kyang cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
132a1('dul ba): gos phul ba de dag dge slong gcig gis kyang ma blangs pa dang / de yang 'di snyam du/ bdag la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dag gi lhung bzed khas
132a2('dul ba): phub bar ma gyur grang snyam du bsam nas de'i lus skya bo seng seng po/ rid cing skam la rmya bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
132a3('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis don de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas
132a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/ kun dga' bo/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas dge slong
132a5('dul ba): dag la gos sbyar te byin na/ ci'i phyir ma blangs zhes smras pa dang / des btsun pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad du/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
132a6('dul ba): kyi dge 'dun sbyin par rigs pa/ rab tu sbyin par rigs pa/ thal mo sbyar bar rigs pa/ phyag bgyi ba nas de dag cang mi mchi bar mchis so/ /zhes bgyi ba'i bar du snga ma
132a7('dul ba): bzhin brjod de/ de ltar na/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis stsal pa dge slong gcig gis kyang ma blangs so/ /zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
132b1('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/ kun dga' bo/ song la mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du sdus shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / btsun
132b2('dul ba): pa| de bzhin bgyi'o/ /zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du
132b3('dul ba): bsags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug
132b4('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da dus la bab bar dgongs shig /mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing mchis pa de thams
132b5('dul ba): cad 'dun khang du 'dus shing tshogs so/ /zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dun khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang / gdan bting ba la bzhugs so/ /
132b6('dul ba): bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong / khyed kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gos mang po bsdus te byin na ci'i
132b7('dul ba): phyir ma blangs zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
133a1('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang kun dga' bo/ dge slong rnams ci'i phyir mi smra bar 'khod ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la
133a2('dul ba): yang rgyas par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed nga'i drung du mya ngan las 'da' bar bsam ste rab tu byung ngam/ btsun
133a3('dul ba): pa| de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ nga'i drung du mya ngan las 'da' bar bsam ste rab tu byung ba de la pa Na phrag stong ri ba'i gos dang / mi lnga brgya yod
133a4('dul ba): pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / ro sna brgya dang ldan pa'i zas rnams rjes su gnang ngo / /dge slong dag /tshul khrims nyams pa dag ni/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra bar rkang pa'i rting pa
133a5('dul ba): gcig tsam yang yongs su spyad par mi gnang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag la ni/ nyes pa'i dmigs 'di bcu yod de/ bcu gang zhe na/ tshul khrims
133a6('dul ba): kyis bdag smad pa dang / gzhan dang / lha dang / ston pas smad pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dang / chos nyid kyis smad pa dang / phyogs phyogs su sdig pa
133a7('dul ba): mi snyan pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pas grags par 'gyur ba dang / ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa rnams nyams pa dang / sngon thos pa'i chos
133b1('dul ba): rnams brjed par 'gyur pa dang / rnam par 'gyod bzhin du dus byed pa dang / lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro ngan song du log par lhung nas sems can dmyal bar
133b2('dul ba): skye'o| |'on kyang dge slong dag gis spyad pa ni/ bzhi ste/ bdag po byed cing yongs su spyod pa dang / byin pas yongs su spyod pa dang / gnang bas yongs su spyod pa dang / bu lon gyis yongs su spyod
133b3('dul ba): pa'o| |de las dge slong 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba de dag ni/ bdag po byed cing yongs su spyod pa'o/ /kun tu sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dag ni/
133b4('dul ba): byin pas yongs su spyod pa'o/ /so so'i skye bo dge ba can bsam gtan dang / klog pa la zhugs pa rnams ni/ gnang bas yongs su spyod pa'o/ /le lo can dag ni/ bu lon gyis
133b5('dul ba): yongs su spyod pa'o/ /tshul khrims nyams pa ni/ yongs su spyod pa thams cad mi gnang ngo / /de lta bas na/ rnyed pa zhig yod na/ dge 'dun gyis mnyam par bgo bar
133b6('dul ba): bya'o| |gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o/ / //mdor na/ bting ba dang ni ma bting dang / /phyung ba dang yang ma phyung dang / /de bzhin
133b7('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol gnas/ /thos pa yi rang bsam pas so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma nyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
134a1('dul ba): so| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba dge slong gis shin tu myong bzhin du
134a2('dul ba): gtan pa bting bar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun gyis gtan pa 'ding ba'i tshe dge slong des dad pa byin la gnyid kyis log ste/ dge 'dun gyi
134a3('dul ba): gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ro/ /u pa li/ de ltar na/ dge slong gtan pa shin tu myong bzhin du gtan pa bting bar mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi gtan pa shin tu ma myong
134a4('dul ba): bzhin du gtan bting bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba'i tshe dad pa byin la nyal la/ dge 'dun gyi gtan pa yang bting
134a5('dul ba): bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba shin tu ma myong ba yang gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ro/ u pa li/ de bzhin du dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis gtan pa 'ding
134a6('dul ba): ba'i tshe dad pa byin pa la gnyid kyis log gam/ snyoms par zhugs pa ste/ shin tu ma myong yang gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis gtan pa
134a7('dul ba): 'byin pa'i tshe myong bar gyur kyang gtan pa ma phyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis gtan pa 'ding pa'i tshe dad pa ma byin la
134b1('dul ba): gnyid kyis log gam/ snyoms par zhugs pa ste/ u pa li/ de ltar na/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myong bar gyur kyang gtan pa ma phyung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis
134b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myong par ma gyur kyang gtan pa phyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe dad pa byin la gnyid kyis
134b3('dul ba): log gam/ snyoms par zhugs sam/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song yang rung ste/ dge 'dun gyis gtan pa phyung ngo / /zhes thos te/ thos nas kyang legs par phyung ba'o/ /shin tu phyung ba'o/ /zhes rjes su yi rang
134b4('dul ba): ba'o| |gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o/ / //mdor na/ bslab pa byin dang tshul shing dang / /gang la las rnams bya ba dang / /bcu gnyis rnams la slar
134b5('dul ba): 'khyal dang / /mi gtsang ba dang mi btsan pa/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
134b6('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal bas tshul shing brim zhing las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /ma ning dang / za ma dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /
134b7('dul ba): pha bsad pa dang / ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / kun
135a1('dul ba): gnas dang / so sor gnas pa dang / mi gnas pas tshul shing brim zhing las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
135a2('dul ba): gang la las bya ba de slar 'khyal na yang mi btsan no/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ gang la chos bzhin ma lags par las bgyis pa de slar 'khyal na yang mi btsan par 'gyur ram
135a3('dul ba): u pa li/ de ni/ btsan no/ btsun pa/ gang zag gi las bcu gnyis bsgos pa'i tshe de dag 'di skad du/ nged cag la ma bsgo zhig ces mchi na/ ci/ de dag de ltar 'khyal ba yang
135a4('dul ba): mi btsan nam/ u pa li/ btsan no/ /de ni/ ngas chad pas bcad pa rnams kyi phyir bsam ste/ gsungs so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi gtsang ba rnams slar 'khyal na/
135a5('dul ba): mi btsan no/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ mi gtsang ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ gang la phas pham pa bzhi'i nang nas gang yang rung ba zhig byung bar gyur
135a6('dul ba): pa ste| de tsam gyis na/ mi gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// //mdor na/ bslab pa byin dang las byed dang //
135a7('dul ba): kun gnas kyang ni de bzhin te/ /bsnyen rdzogs mtshams kyi phyi rol du/ /mngags te gtang bar mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
135b1('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ las bgyid pa bslab pa stsal bas las bgyis na/ bgyis pa zhes
135b2('dul ba): bgyi'am/ 'on te ma bgyis pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ slar yang bya dgos so/ /de bzhin du ma ning dang / za ma dang / mi gnas pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du
135b3('dul ba): bya'o| |gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig la dge sbyong zhig bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod nas des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i dge slong rnams sbran te/ des
135b4('dul ba): b snyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir des dge tshul pha de khrid de dkyil 'khor du dong nas de dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor du phyin nas de mtshams kyi phyi rol tu mngags te btang
135b5('dul ba): ba dang / de gnyen dag gis khrid de song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa de rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba'i bar chad du gyur pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge
135b6('dul ba): slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de mtshams
135b7('dul ba): kyi phyi rol tu ma mngags shig / 'di lta ste/ dge slong dag /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo dbang bskur ba'i rigs pa/ dbang ma bskur nas rgyal tshab 'thob pa de/ rab
136a1('dul ba): tu bsrung bar bya ba dang / rab tu bskyang bar bya ba de bzhin du dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de yang rab tu bsrung zhing bskyang ba'i rigs so/ /de
136a2('dul ba): lta bas na/ dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa'i dge tshul de/ mi thos pa'i nye 'khor tsam du spangs la mthong ba'i nye 'khor tsam du thal mo sbyar te mngon du lta bzhin
136a3('dul ba): zhog cig / de ltar na/ nyes pa'i dmigs su mi 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// //mdor na/ bzod par gsol ba byed
136a4('dul ba): dang mtshams/ /spu bsnyal ba yang de bzhin no/ /'thab mo rgod pa bsdigs pa dang / /smad par bya dang rigs sun pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal
136a5('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdigs pa'i las
136a6('dul ba): bgyis pas bzod par gsol cig / ces gsungs na/ gang du bzod par gsol bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ mtshams kyi nang du'o/ /ji ltar bzod par gsol bar bgyi/ spu
136a7('dul ba): langs shing rab tu langs pa las dge 'dun la spu nyal bar byed/ 'byung bar rtsol/ phyag 'tshal ba mngon du ston cing / 'thab mo rgod pa de yang slar gtong ba'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom
136b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis 'thab mo rgod pa'i dge slong dag la bsdigs pa'i las byos shig / ces gsungs na/ de ste btsun pa/ de la bsdigs pa'i las bgyid pa'i tshe ma rangs par gyur na/ de la
136b2('dul ba): thabs ji lta bur bgyi/ u pa li/ de'i yo byad dang rdzas las kha cig gis lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer cig /kha cig gis ni/ par bur gyi snod dag khyer la phyi rol tu phyung ste
136b3('dul ba): 'or cig / de ste ka ba la 'ju na yang ka ba chod cig /de ste sgo skyes la 'ju na yang sgo skyes phyung la/ de la ngo ldog mi phod pa ma byed cig /de slar sus bcos par bgyi/ dge 'dun gyis
136b4('dul ba): so/ /su la bcol ba'i yo byad dgug /sbyin bdag la slong la de ste ma 'byor na/ dge 'dun thams cad kyi nor las byos shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /de ste btsun pa/ dge
136b5('dul ba): slong ma zhig 'thab mo rgod par gyur na/ de la yang bsdigs pa'i las bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de la yang bsdigs pa'i las bya'o/ /de ste ma rangs par gyur na zhes pa nas/ the tshom ma byed cig ces
136b6('dul ba): bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma zhig 'thab mo rgod par gyur na/ de dag la yang bsdigs par bgyi'am/ de la the tshom
136b7('dul ba): du ma byed cig ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs sun phyung ba'i dge slong la bskrad pa'i las byos shig /ces gsungs na/ de ste btsun pa/
137a1('dul ba): de la bskrad pa'i las bgyid pa'i tshe de ma rangs par gyur na/ de la ji ltar bgyi/ u pa li/ de la yo byad rnams zhes bya ba nas the tshom ma byed
137a2('dul ba): cig / ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /de bzhin du dge slong mas rigs sun pa dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma dag la yang bskrad pa'i las bgyi'am/
137a3('dul ba): de la the tshom du ma byed cig /ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ 'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam
137a4('dul ba): po so gsum pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong skrod cig ces gsungs na/ sus bskrad par bgyi/ de ni/ dge 'dun gyis bskrad par
137a5('dul ba): bya'o/ /de'i yo byad las kha cig gis ni/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer/ kha cig gis ni/ par bur gyi snod dag khyer te phyi rol tu phyung la 'or cig /de ste ka ba la 'jus na/
137a6('dul ba): ka ba chod cig /sgo skyes la 'jus na/ sgo skyes kyang phyung la/ de la ngo ldog mi phod par ma byed cig /slar sus bcos par bgyi/ dge 'dun gyis so/ /'chos pa'i yo byad su las
137a7('dul ba): dgug / yon bdag la bskul lo/ /des kyang ma 'byor na/ dge 'dun thams cad kyi nor gyis slar bcos par bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong
137b1('dul ba): la ji ltar dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma dag kyang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa la smod par byed pa'i dge slong de la slar bsdum
137b2('dul ba): pa'i las byos shig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste dge slong mas kyang khyim pa la smad par gyur na/ de la yang slar bsdum pa'i las bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de la yang slar bsdum pa'i
137b3('dul ba): las byed du chug cig / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khyim pa la smod na/ slar bsdum pa'i las
137b4('dul ba): byed du chug cig / ces gsungs na/ dge slong gis dge slong la smod na/ de la yang slar bsdum pa'i las bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de la yang slar bsdum pa'i las bya'o/ /dge slong gis dge slong
137b5('dul ba): ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /dge slob mas dge slong ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma
137b6('dul ba): la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /dge slob mas dge slob ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /dge tshul phas dge tshul pha
137b7('dul ba): dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /dge tshul mas dge tshul ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
138a1('dul ba): dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /de ltar 'khor lo bzhin rgyas par brjod do/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa
138a2('dul ba): bdun pa'o/ / //mdor na/ dge tshul dag dang bsdigs pa dang / /lnga las nyung ba mi gnas dang / /u pa lis ni ji ltar dris/ /nub mo lnga yang byin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
138a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun
138a4('dul ba): pa/ dge slong gis bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa'i dge tshul la bsnyen par rdzogs pa bgyis na/ de bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/
138a5('dul ba): u pa li/ bsnyen par ni/ rdzogs mod kyi/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /bzod pa ni/ gsol ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das
138a6('dul ba): kyis lo lnga lon la/ chos rnam pa lnga dang ldan na/ gnas ma bcas kyang ljongs spyad pa spyod du gnang ngo / /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ lo bzhi lon la chos rnam pa lnga dang ldan
138a7('dul ba): na/ de'ang gnas ma bcas par ljongs spyod pa spyod du gnang ngam/ u pa li/ mi gnang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lo lnga ma lon pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro/ /de ste lo drug gam/ lo
138b1('dul ba): dgu lon la/ de yang chos lnga dang mi ldan na/ de gnas ma bcas par ljongs spyad pa spyod du gnang ngam/ u pa li/ mi gnang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos lnga dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir
138b2('dul ba): ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo gsum lon la/ de yang sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/ dri ma gsum dang bral na/ de yang gzhan la gnas
138b3('dul ba): bca' bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de yang de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcas pa'i tshul du bya ba'i phyir ro/ /ji srid du gnas ma bcas pa la rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de mang na
138b4('dul ba): yang zhag lnga'i bar du ste/ yang gnas bca' ba chol zhing sbyor ba ma btang ba'o/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// //mdor na/ mthun pa
138b5('dul ba): dag dang mi mthun pa/ /tshad gzung du yang med pa dang / /bcas pa dang ni ma bcas pa/ /de bzhin ming dang rigs kyang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i tshal mgon med zas
138b6('dul ba): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ nongs pa mthun pa zhes kyang bgyi/ mi mthun pa zhes kyang bgyi na
138b7('dul ba): btsun pa/ nongs pa mthun pa gang lags/ mi mthun pa gang lags/ u pa li/ phas pham pa rnams ni/ phas pham par mthun gyi/ gzhan dang mi mthun pa'o/ /dge 'dun gyi lhag ma
139a1('dul ba): ni/ dge 'dun gyi lhag mar mthun no/ /ltung ba ni/ ltung bar mthun no/ /so sor bshags pa ni/ so sor bshags par mthun no/ /nyes byas ni/ nyes byas su
139a2('dul ba): mthun no/ /btsun pa/ nongs pa chad dang ldan pa zhes kyang bgyi/ nongs pa tshad dang mi ldan pa zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa/ tshad dang ldan pa ni/ gang lags/ mi ldan pa ni/ gang lags/

139a4('dul ba): bya'o/ /btsun pa/ nongs pa bcabs pa zhes kyang bgyi/ ma bcabs pa zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa/ bcabs pa gang lags/ ma bcabs pa gang lags/ u pa li/ de ni/ rnam pa
139a5('dul ba): gnyis kyis bcabs pa ste/ sems kyis bcabs pa dang / zhag tu bcabs pa'o/ /de la zhag tu bcabs pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma bcabs pa'o/ /sems kyis bcabs pa gang yin
139a6('dul ba): pa de ni/ bcabs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ nongs pa rnams kyi ming dang / rus zhes bgyi ba/ btsun pa/ ming gang lags/ rus gang lags/ u pa li/ phas pham pa rnams
139a7('dul ba): ni/ ming ngo / /de las byung ba ni/ rus so/ /dge 'dun gyi lhag ma zhes bya ba ni/ ming ngo / /de las byung ba ni/ rus so/ /ltung ba dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas rnams ni/
139b1('dul ba): ming ngo / /de las byung ba ni/ rus so/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// //mdor na/ gcig la chad pas bcad pa dang / /bslab pa byin la
139b2('dul ba): mi spyad de/ /de dag la ni dad mi sbyin/ /dge slong byed dam mi len to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
139b3('dul ba): drug sde dag dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung bar gyur nas de dag chad pas bcad pa dang / de dag ra ba'i nang du dkyil 'khor byas nas chad pa byed do/ /de dag la dge slong dag gis tshe
139b4('dul ba): dang ldan pa dag / ci zhig byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ chad pa byed do/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis 'di ni/ slar bcabs pa yin gyi/ chad pa ma yin no/ /zhes smras pa dang /
139b5('dul ba): de dag spa gong nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag /gang na dge slong gcig
139b6('dul ba): pu gnas pa der chad pa'i las ma byed cig / ces bka' stsal to /gang du dge slong gnyis sam/ gsum gnas pa der yang dge slong dag gis chad pa'i las ma byed cig /gang
139b7('dul ba): na dge slong bzhi'am/ de las lhag pa yang rung gnas pa der dge slong dag gis chad pa dang / gzhi nas bslang ba'i chad pa dang / gzhi nas slar bslang ba dang / yid mgu bar bya ba
140a1('dul ba): dang / gzhi nas bslang ba'i yid mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas slar bslangs te yid mgu ba dag byos shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang na dge slong
140a2('dul ba): bzhi'am/ de las lhag par gnas pa de dag tu dge slong gis chad pa dang / gzhi nas bslang ba'i chad pa dang / gzhi nas slar bslang ba dang / yid mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas
140a3('dul ba): bslang ba'i yid mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas slar bslang ba dag kyang byos shig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong pa dag gis bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong bzhi la chad pa byed
140a4('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bslab pa'i byin pa'i dge slong bzhi la yang chad pa byed du mi gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong bzhi

140a6('dul ba): dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa gnyis la byed do/ /bslab pa byin pa gcig dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa gsum la chad pa byed do/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
140a7('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bslab pa byin pa bzhi la yang chad pa ma byed cig/ /bslab pa byin pa gsum dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa
140b1('dul ba): gcig la yang ma byed cig / bslab pa byin pa gnyis dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa gnyis la yang ma byed cig /bslab pa byin pa gcig dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa gsum la yang chad pa ma
140b2('dul ba): byed par yongs su dag pa bzhi'am/ de las mang ba rnams la chad pa byos shig /chad pas bcad pa la ji lta bar chad pa gzhi nas bslang ba dang / gzhi nas slar bslang ba dang / yid mgu bar
140b3('dul ba): byed pa dang / gzhi nas bslangs te yid mgu bar byed pa dang / gzhi nas slar bslang ba'i yid mgu bar bya ba rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
140b4('dul ba): zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal pa la dad pa stsal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /chos nyid la reg na/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal ba las dad pa blang du rung ngam/ u
140b5('dul ba): pa li/ de la dge slong du 'du shes bzhag na/ gdod rung ngo / /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa rdzogs te/ sgo gnyis pa rdzogs so// //mdor
140b6('dul ba): bsdus pa ni/ dkyil 'khor lhung bzed dugs khang dang / /dud pa btung dang khar phor dang / /lcags skra shing rta'i lte ba dang / gdang shing sgron ma mchod rten te/ /mdor na/ dkyil 'khor

154a7('dul ba): ces bsgo'o/ /de lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig /ces bsgo na je thur 'then te 'gro 'dod nas ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang dga' ba can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer mthong
154b1('dul ba): nas de'i sgor phyin pa dang / de nas yang lha'i bu mo de bas kyang gzugs legs pa/ de bas kyang blta na sdug pa/ de bas kyang mdzes pa bcu drug byung ste/ de dag gis bu mo mdza' mo bde bar byon tam/
154b2('dul ba): bu mo mdza' mo tshur spyon/ bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa 'di dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / nyal ba'i khang pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / shel dang /

154b5('dul ba): kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo yang je thur 'then cing 'gro bar 'dod nas de ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang / bla ma'i tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa bzang po zhig mthong nas de'i sgor 'ongs
154b6('dul ba): ba dang / de'i nang nas lha'i bu mo de bas kyang gzugs legs pa/ de bas kyang blta na sdug pa/ shin tu bzang mo sum cu rtsa gnyis shig byung nas de dag gis bu mo mdza' mo tshur spyon/ mdza' mo bde
154b7('dul ba): bar byon tam/ bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa 'di dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / nyal ba'i khang pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / shel dang / byi ru dang /

155a2('dul ba): brgya du ma/ lo stong du ma/ lo brgya stong du mar ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul chen pos myong ba bzhin myong bar gyur to/ /de dag gis kyi lho phyogs

155a4('dul ba): pa skyes te/ de rim gyis lho phyogs su song ba dang lcags las byas pa'i grong khyer zhig mthong ste/ de der zhugs so/ /der zhugs ma thag tu de'i sgo yang slar bcad par gyur to/ /de nas yang
155a5('dul ba): nang du song ba dang sgo yang de bzhin du bcad do/ /de nas yang nang du song ba dang / sgo yang bcad par gyur te/ ji tsam zhig na skyes bu rab tu lus che ba zhig de nas byung ste de'i spyi bo la lcags kyi
155a6('dul ba): 'khor lo 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ shin tu rab tu 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa zhig 'khor zhing 'dug ste/ de'i mgo las rnag khrag byung ba ni/ zas su za bar mthong ngo / /de nas bu
155a7('dul ba): mo mdza' mos skyes bu de la/ khyod ci'i phyir de ltar gyur ces dris pa dang / des/ ngas ni/ ma la gnod pa byas pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes skyes bu des de skad du smras ma thag tu bu mo mdza' mo de'i

160b6('dul ba): bal dang / ldum bu sha na ka dang / ras bal dang / gso ma dang / rtswa du gu la dang / ldum bu ko tam pa dang / srin bal gyi skud pa las byas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang rten chongs
160b7('dul ba): shig| ces gsungs na/ ji ltar bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khri dang rkang rten chongs shig /ces gsungs na/
161a1('dul ba): ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag
161a2('dul ba): gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas des sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzang / bdag nad 'di 'dra ba zhig gis btab na/ sman dpyad kyi thabs ston cig /ces smras pa dang / des/ khyim bdag /snum
161a3('dul ba): bag sngar zo zhig dang phyis bkru sman gtang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / de snum bag za ba la zhugs so/ /ji tsam zhig na de'i grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i dge slong der 'ongs nas des/ khyim bdag /ci
161a4('dul ba): byed cing 'dug ces smras pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so/ /des/ khyim bdag /kho bo bkru sman gtong bar rab tu mkhas kyi/ sman pa la sbyin pa de kho bo la byin cig dang / ngas
161a5('dul ba): khyod la bkru sman btang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / khyim bdag des/ legs kyi/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes smras nas des de bkru sman btang nas gtsug lag khang du langs te song ngo / /khyim
161a6('dul ba): bdag de'i bkru sman mchod nas de'i nye du dag song ste sman pa la dris pa/ khyim bdag de bkru sman mchong na/ thabs ji lta bur bgyi zhes smras pa dang / de la bkru sman sus blud/ de dag gis/
161a7('dul ba): 'phags pa/ 'di zhes bya bas blud do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de khros nas de nyid kyi gan du song la dris shig /ces smras so/ /de dag gis de de'i shi ba las sos nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
161b1('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis rngan pa len cing sman ma gtong zhig /de ste bkru sman btang na yang gung du ma 'gro
161b2('dul ba): zhig / de 'dra ba'i rkyen cig byung na yang sman dpyad ston la song zhig /de bzhin du ma byas par song na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ nor bdag gis nor
161b3('dul ba): chags pa bzung ste/ des de la dus 'di tsam zhig na byin cig ces dus btab nas btang ngo / /des bsam pa/ de ltar dus btang tu zin kyang ngas dus bzhin du gzhal bar mi nus kyi/ ci nas dus la bab na
161b4('dul ba): bros te 'gro'o/ /snyam du bsam mo/ /phyis yang bsam pa/ yul dang bral te 'gro ba yang rab tu sdug bsngal gyi/ ci nas nor bdag de gsad do/ /snyam bsam nas de dze ta'i tshal du 'gro ba'i lam du des de
161b5('dul ba): bsad do/ /ji tsam zhig na drug sde dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis bsam pa/ bdag cag gis phyag dar khrod kyi gos rnyed do/ /snyam bsam nas bshu bar bsam pa dang / de'i gnyen dag gnas
161b6('dul ba): der 'ongs nas de dag gis de mthong ste ngu ba la zhugs nas khyed dag gis bsad do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis nged kyis ni/ ma bsad kyi/ gdon mi za bar dgras bsad do/ /zhes smras so/ /de
161b7('dul ba): ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de'i gnyen rnams dogs pa skyes pa ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ dge
162a1('dul ba): slong dag gis de 'dra ba'i phyag dar khrod ni/ ma len cig /gang gi tshe na skye bo mang po dag gis rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshe na/ slang bar bya ste/ de ltar ma byas na/ 'das pa dang
162a2('dul ba): bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po so lnga pa/ mdor na/ lcags kyi gong bu gzar bu dang / /rgyab khur
162a3('dul ba): rked pa mgo bo dang / /pha dang ma la gos dang zas/ /spu can chos gos gsum pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
162a4('dul ba): so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi gong bu lcags thag gis thogs shig /ces gsungs na/ lcags thag ji lta
162a5('dul ba): bu gdag par bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sman gyi gzar bu chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa
162a6('dul ba): li/ de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rgyab dang / rked pa dang / mgo la khur ma khyer cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong
162a7('dul ba): ma dag gis kyang rgyab dang / rked pa dang / mgo la khur mi bkur bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dge slong ma dag gis kyang rgyab dang / rked pa dang / mgo la khur ma khyer cig /de ste khyer na/ 'das pa
162b1('dul ba): dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod
162b2('dul ba): do/ /de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyad nas dus phyi zhig na de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / de la bu gzugs legs pa/ blta na sdug
162b3('dul ba): pa/ bzang ba/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i khye'u zhig btsas te/ de dag gis btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas nas ming btags so/ /de bsrings bskyed de cher gyur pa dang / ji tsam dus
162b4('dul ba): phyi zhig na pha ma la ma gsol bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs
162b5('dul ba): pa dang / de'i pha rgan pos mthong nas bu khyod rab tu byung na/ nged cag sus gso bar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang / de spa gong nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
162b6('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /pha dang / ma ni/ bu'i dka' ba byed pa ste/ de lta bas na/ bu rab tu byung yang pha dang / ma gnyis kyi bza' ba dang /
162b7('dul ba): bgo ba dag sbyor bar rjes su gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung yang pha ma gnyis kyi bza' ba dang / bgo ba dag sbyor cig /ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar sbyar ba
163a1('dul ba): mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang lhung bzed dang / chos gos lhag par gyur pa des sbyar bar byos shig /de ste med na/ sbyin bdag la bslangs
163a2('dul ba): te sbyor cig / de ste dge 'dun du gtogs la dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dbang bar gyur na/ de'i phyed byin cig /de ste bsod snyoms pa zhig na/ bsod snyoms phyed sbyin par gyis shig /de ltar ma byas
163a3('dul ba): na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa nas mi ring ba zhig na ri brag gi grong zhig yod de/ ri brag gi grong de na gtsug lag khang zhig
163a4('dul ba): yod pa de'i nang na rgan zhugs gzhan zhig gnas te/ de nas dus phyi zhig na mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par song ngo / /drug sde rnams ni/ chos kyis kyang drug sde'i nang na
163a5('dul ba): gcig gis ni/ dze ta'i tshal gyi sgo srung pas na/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo sgo na 'dug pa des mgo dkar la smin ma ring ba zhig rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsam pa/ dge slong
163a6('dul ba): gnas brtan gang zhig 'dir 'ong / bsur 'gro'o/ /snyam bsam ste/ de sngar song ba dang / des gnas brtan bde bar 'ongs sam zhes smras so/ /des slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag

163b1('dul ba): shog / gtsug lag khang du 'dong ngo / /zhes smras so/ /des gtsug lag khang du khrid nas ngal bsor bcug pa dang / des cung zad cig 'dug nas slob dpon/ bdag ni/ mchod rten la phyag
163b2('dul ba): 'tshal du mchi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / nye dga' bos/ sdod cig dang 'du ba'i dus la bab pa dang bya'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / des/ slob dpon/ bdag gis chos gos gsum ga yang khyer te ma 'ongs

163b4('dul ba): par thang ni/ mthang gos su byin gyis brlabs/ la ba ni/ stod g.yogs su byin gyis brlabs/ be'u ras ni/ sbyar mar byin gyis brlabs te/ de nas la ba dang be'u ras gnyis phrag pa la bzhag nas
163b5('dul ba): par thang gis dkris pa'i steng du the gus dkris te dam du bcings nas de nas 'dus pa'i nang du btang ba dang / dge slong dag gis mthong nas de nas dge slong kun tu bcings pa kha cig gis ni/ nyes pa
163b6('dul ba): ngor brjod do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rgan zhugs pha bi ci'i phyir smyon thabs byed ces smras pa dang / des/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /'di ni/ kho bo'i chos gos gsum yin te/ kho bo ni/ glo bur du 'ongs na/
163b7('dul ba): gang du gzhag ces smras pa dang / de dag gis chos gos gsum de 'dra ba yin nam zhes smras pa dang / des/ gang la med pa de ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhes smras so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
164a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa de ni/ dge slong dag gis spu ring po las chos
164a2('dul ba): gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlab par mi gnang bar dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /
164a3('dul ba): dge slong rnams nyes pa ngor brjod pa ni/ yus te/ nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa de ni/ spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag spu ring po las
164a4('dul ba): chos gos gsum du byin gyis ma rlobs shig / de ste byin gyis brlabs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin
164a5('dul ba): gyis ma rlobs shig / ces gsungs pa dang / dad pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis la ba dang / phrug stan dang / be'u ras dag phul ba dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma blangs pa dang /
164a6('dul ba): des/ 'phags pa dang / nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba'i tshe na ni/ mu stegs can dag yon gnas lags na/ da ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung
164a7('dul ba): bas khyed cag yon gnas lags te/ da khyed kyis ma blangs na/ bdag cag gis dge ba'i zong med bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu ji ltar 'gro zhes smras pa dang / de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug
164b1('dul ba): go / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dang pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag zer ba ni/ bden te/ de lta bas
164b2('dul ba): na/ ngas rjes su gnang gi/ longs la spu thung du rnams ni/ lhag pa'i gos su byin gyis rlobs shig /spu ring po rnams ni/ yon bdag gir byin gyis rlobs la bcang bar gyis shig /gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum
164b3('dul ba): pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o/ / //mdor na/ dbu dang sen mo'i mchod rten dang / /kha dog dkar po mar me dang / /khyim dang mar me snod dag dang / /ba lang btsun mo rta babs so//

164b7('dul ba): skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten brtsig par bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag /ngas rjes su gnang gi /rtsigs shig /des gzhi yangs
165a1('dul ba): pa'i gnas shig tu mdza' bo dang / phu nu dang / gnyen dag dang lhan cig tu rim gro cher byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten yang skye
165a2('dul ba): bo thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa zhig brtsigs nas/ rdo thal gyis ma byugs pas mi mdzes par gyur nas de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/

165a6('dul ba): mdzes par gyur nas de yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/

165b1('dul ba): te mi mdzes par gyur na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la mchod par bgyis la mtshan mo zhugs mar gyi phreng

165b4('dul ba): phreng ba 'og tu zhog cig / des mar me'i phreng ba 'og tu bzhag pa dang / khyis mar me 'thungs nas snod kyang khyer ro/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/

165b7('dul ba): bdag / ngas rjes su gnang gi /de ltar byos shig /des mar me'i khang bu dag kyang byas so/ /dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la ba lang dag gis bsnyogs pa dang / de yang bcom ldan 'das gang
166a1('dul ba): na ba der song nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs

166a7('dul ba): skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la mdza' bo dang / phu nu dang / gnyen dag bsags nas mchod pa chen po byas so/ /skye bo mang po dag de lta bu mthong nas rab tu mos te/ de dag dad pa skyes nas de
166b1('dul ba): dag gis kyang rnam pa de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten dag gnas gnas su brtsigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na ji srid dgyes pa'i bar du bzhugs
166b2('dul ba): nas rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der ljongs spyad pa spyod cing rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka land ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan
166b3('dul ba): 'das yul dbus 'gyur 'chang nas ljongs spyad pa spyod cing rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka land ka gnas pa na bzhugs par thos te/ thos nas rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /

167a1('dul ba): tog rgyas/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / skeg dang / ko ki la dang / dzi ba dzi ba ka la sogs pa'ang skad 'byin par byed pa'i nags stug po de na
167a2('dul ba): nang gi btsun mo dag gis bskor cing 'dug 'dug pa las/ de la nang gi btsun mo dag gis gsol pa/ lha/ bdag cag gis nyin re re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal lta zhing mchi bar mi nus na/
167a3('dul ba): lhas nang gi btsun mo dag gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten zhig rtsig par mdzod cig dang de la bdag cag gis rim gro bskyed de me tog dang / dri dang / byug
167a4('dul ba): pa dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod par bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang /
167a5('dul ba): sen mo stsol cig dang / bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten nang gi btsun mo dag gi dbus su rtsig go /zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das
167a6('dul ba): kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo stsal nas des bsti stang dang / rim gro cher byas te nang gi btsun mo dag dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten nang gi btsun
167a7('dul ba): mo'i dbus su brtsigs nas de la nang gi btsun mo dag gis mar me dang / spos dang / me tog dang / dri dang / byug pa dag gis rab tu mchod pa byas so/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra la
167b1('dul ba): mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lhas sbyin gyis sbad nas pha chos can/ chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa 'tsho ba dang yongs su phral nas bdag nyid rgyal por zhugs so/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
167b2('dul ba): pa la chos kyi sbyin pa thams cad gcad par khrims bcas pas/ sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la bya ba mi byed do/ /gang gi tshe bco lnga pa'i skabs 'byed pa'i dus
167b3('dul ba): la bab pa de'i tshe na yang dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la su yang phyag dar dang / mar me dang / me tog gis mchod pa mi byed do/ /de nas btsun mo dag gis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la rnam pa de
167b4('dul ba): lta bu mthong nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po dran te de dag mi dga' ste mya ngan byed cing / kyi hud/ chos kyi rgyal po dang bral bar gyur nas bdag cag gi bsod nams kyang zad par gyur to/ /zhes zer zhing
167b5('dul ba): du bar gyur to/ /de'i nang nas btsun mo dpal gyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba zhig gis 'tsho ba la ma bltas par sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su bran nas dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten gyi phyag dar byas te mar me'i
167b6('dul ba): phreng ba dag phul lo/ /ji tsam na ma skyes dgra khang steng du byung ste bltas pa dang / snang ba chen po byung ba mthong nas pha bi ci zhig ces dris pa dang / gzhan zhig gis/ dpal gyi blo gros mas dbu skra dang / sen
167b7('dul ba): mo'i mchod rten la zhugs mar gyi phreng ba phul zhes smras pa dang / dpal gyi blo gros ma bos nas ci'i phyir rgyal po'i khrims las 'gal bar bya zhes smras pa dang / btsun mos/ kho mos rgyal po'i khrims
168a1('dul ba): las 'gal mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho mos chos kyi rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i khrims las ma 'gal lo/ /zhes smras pa dang / de khros te 'khor lo 'phangs nas de
168a2('dul ba): 'tsho ba dang phral ba dang / de bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad bzhin du dus las 'das pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas bzang por skyes so/ /de'i tshe na lha rnams 'dun sar
168a3('dul ba): 'dus so/ /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros ma dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu snang ba'i 'od kyis lus bskor nas lha'i 'dun sar song ngo / /de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos dpag tshad kho ra
168a4('dul ba): khor yug tu rgya cher snang ba'i 'od mthong nas dris pa/ gser gyi lus la su yis bskus/ /pad+mo ut+pal bzhin 'dra ba/ /dpal ldan mi mtshungs ci las byung / /khyod kyi lus las 'od byung
168a5('dul ba): ba/ /ci phyir khyod gdong pad+mo 'dra/ /khyod ni gser gyi 'od 'dra ba/ /ci 'bras lha mo bdag la smros/ /gang gi las las byung ba spyod/ /lha mos smras pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ni/ /skye
168a6('dul ba): bo rnams kyi mar me ste/ /sangs rgyas mchog gi mtshan mthong bas/ /mun sel de la mar me phul/ /nyon mongs mun pa sel la phul/ /zla zer 'dra ba'i 'od mthong nas/ /thub pa gsal ba'i
168a7('dul ba): dngos po ste/ /ston pa'i 'od mthu mthong bas na/ /gsung ba mchog la phyag byas pa/ /de yi las kyis 'dir skyes te/ /bdag la rab tu gsal zhing mdzes/ /bdag gdong blta na sdug pa ni/ /pad+mo
168b1('dul ba): zla bzhin rnam par dag / brgya byin gyis smras pa/ e ma'o zhing 'di yon tan can/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs la/ /mtho ris gang du skye ba yi/ /khyod kyis sa bon der btab bo/ /gser bzhin spungs
168b2('dul ba): la dkar ba yin/ /rnam pa mchog la sus mi mchod/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo kha 'byed bzhin/ /gang du lhags skyes pad+mo spyan/ /yan lag mchog rnams 'bar ba ste/ /spyan ni ka ma la dang 'dra/ /chos nyid
168b3('dul ba): kyis lha'i bu pho'am/ lha'i bu mo yang rung ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum du skyes nas ring po ma lon par gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang yin pas skyes pa ste/ sems 'di
168b4('dul ba): gsum skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas bdag gang nas shi 'phos zhes bltas na/ mi las so/ /gang du snyam pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i khams bzang por skyes pa mthong

168b6('dul ba): mi rigs kyi/ ci nas bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /snyam bsam nas/ de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas dri ma med pa 'tsher ba'i rna cha ni/ thogs/ lus

169a1('dul ba): rgya chen pos thams cad 'od snang bar byas te bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis mngon par gtor nas chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /

169a4('dul ba): brjod pa bya ba rnam gsum brjod de/ btsun pa/ bdag la 'di ltar ni/ phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lhas kyang ma bgyis/ sdug pas kyang ma

169a7('dul ba): mthus ni rab gsal ba/ /ngan song lam ste nyes mang po/ /mtho ris bsod nams sgo yang phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /khyod la brten nas nyes pa rnams kyang spangs/ /bdag
169b1('dul ba): gis rtag tu rnam dag mig kyang thob/ /'phags pa dga' zhing zhi ba'i lam yang thob/ /sdug bsngal mtsho las pha rol bdag brgal nas/ /'gro ba na yang lha mi rnams kyis mchod/ /skye rga na dang 'chi ba'i

169b4('dul ba): bzhin/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin/ longs spyod gang dag dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs pa'i longs spyod de nyid dang bdag gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag

170b1('dul ba): gyi bar du 'jig rten 'dir ma 'ongs so/ /'jig rten 'jig pa'i tshe kun snang dang ba'i lha'i ris su skyes so/ /rtas pa'i tshe tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong par skyes nas der yang ngas tshangs pa dang / tshangs
170b2('dul ba): chen gyi bdag por gyur nas ngas zil gyis non gyi/ gzhan gyis ma yin no/ /sems can brgya phrag bcu la dbang bsgyur te sems can gyi nang na mchog tu bsngags so/ /stong phrag gsum cu rtsa drug gi bar

170b4('dul ba): yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / dmag mi rin po che dang bdun no/ /

171a1('dul ba): gdul ba dang / dul ba'o/ /snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs nas yang ston pas 'di skad gsungs so/ /dge zhing bde bar 'dod pa yis//

171a6('dul ba): cing longs spyod che ba der/ /de 'dra'i rigs su nga yang skyes/ /nor rdzas thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /rin chen sna bdun de bzhin te/ /nor dang yo byad mang por ldan/ /rgyal po grags shing 'jigs

173b6('dul ba): chag chag gdab/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang

180b4('dul ba): du 'jug tu yang med par de dag gis bgags pa dang / de dag thams cad nad du gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

180b6('dul ba): ma byed cig / btso blag gi las kyang ma byed cig /dge slong dag gis snam phyi sa na gtam zer zhing 'dug gam/ rim bzhin du byed dam/ de'i nye 'khor du ston tam/ kha ton byed dam/ klog
180b7('dul ba): gam/ btso blag gi las byed na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag bkru sar 'khru zhing 'dug pa ma zin par drug sde dag gis nged rgan no/ /zhes zer nas bslang ngo / /de ltar
181a1('dul ba): gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis bkru sar dge slong bkru ba
181a2('dul ba): ma zin par ma bslang zhig / bslangs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag gci sar song ba dang / phyis drug sde dag der 'ongs te nged cag rgan gyi/ ji ltar rgan rim
181a3('dul ba): bzhin du 'jug go / zhes smras pa dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

181a7('dul ba): ltar rgan rim bzhin ma bkur cig / dge slong gis dge slong dag gi rkang pa bkru ma zin par rkang pa bkru ba'i gzhi rgan rim bzhin du khyer na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /

181b5('dul ba): dang sen gcod dang / /smang tsher dang ni rkang rten no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde dag gis
181b6('dul ba): dge slong dag btso blag gi las byed pa ma zin par dge 'dun gyi tshon gyi bum pa rgan rim bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes zer te khyer ba dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
181b7('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis btso blag gi las byed pa ma zin par dge 'dun gyi tshon gyi bum pa dag rgan
182a1('dul ba): rim du ma bkur cig / dge slong gis dge slong dag gi btso blag gi las byed pa ma zin par dge 'dun gyi tshon gyi bum pa rgan rim du khyer na/ 'das pa dang

182a5('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag gis dge slong dag zan za zhing skom phyed tsam 'thungs pa dang / btung ba'i phur bu rgan rim du bya'o/ /zhes zer nas khyer te de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa

182b1('dul ba): gis dge slong dag skra phyed tsam bregs pa dang / spu gri yang rgan rim du bya'o/ /zhes zer te khyer ro/ /de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol

182b3('dul ba): spu phyed tsam bregs pa dang / spu gri rgan rim du khyer na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag gis dge slong dag skra dang / kha spu 'breg pa'i spu gri rnon por bya ba'i spu gri brdar la phyed

182b6('dul ba): pa'i spu gri brdar la phyed tsam brdar ba la rgan rim du khyer na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag gis dge slong dag sen mo phyed tsam bcad pa dang / sen mo gcod pa rgan rim du

184b7('dul ba): rung bu'i gnas su gzhan dang gzhan gyi las ma zin par dge 'dun gyi stan gyi steng du 'dug pa dang / rgan rim bzhin bya'o/ /zhes zer nas bslang ste btang nas de dag 'phya bar gyur to
