228a5('dul ba): ro| |rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o/ / //mdor na/ khyi dang khra dang 'ug pa dang / /mi sha za ba'i bya dag dang / /rta dang dre'u dang wa dang ni/ /spre'u rnams
228a6('dul ba): bza' bar mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mu ge byung nas khyim pa dag khyi'i sha za
228a7('dul ba): ba la zhugs pa dang / drug sde dag mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la dong ste khyim gang nas gang du 'ongs pa de dang der 'phags pa/ cung zad tsam yang ma mchis so/ /zhes smras
228b1('dul ba): pa dang / de nas yang khyim gzhan zhig tu 'ongs pa dang / de na rdze'u'i nang na khyi sha zhig 'tshod de khol zhing 'dug go /khyim bdag gi chung mas/ 'phags pa/ cung zad kyang ma mchis kyi/ bzhud
228b2('dul ba): cig / ces smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ rdze'u'i nang na khol zhing 'dug pa de ci yin/ 'phags pa 'di ni/ khyi sha'o/ /ci/ khyed cag khyi sha za'am/ 'phags pa/ mu ge byung bas na/
228b3('dul ba): 'tshal lo/ /de ltar na/ nged cag kyang byin cig /'phags pa/ khyod kyang gsol lam/ kye/ nged cag gi srog khyed la brten na/ khyed cag za na/ nged cag kyang ci'i phyir mi za/ de dag gis
228b4('dul ba): byin no/ /de byin pa dang khyer te song ngo / /khyi dag gi snar mnam pa tshor nas de dag gis bskor cing bdag bdag gi skad kyis zugs shing ngu ste/ phyi bzhin du 'brang ba bram ze dang /
228b5('dul ba): khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci'i slad du khyi dag gis gtses bzhin du 'dong / de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag bsod snyoms khyi sha cung
228b6('dul ba): zad cig rnyed do/ /'phags pa/ ci/ khyed cag khyi'i sha za'am/ kye/ 'di lta bu bsod snyoms mi rnyed pa'i dus na nged cag ci ltogs bzhin du 'chi'am/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
228b7('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gang dge slong dag gis khyi sha zos pa na/ nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur te/ de bas na/ dge slong dag khyi sha
229a1('dul ba): ma za zhig / dge slong dag gis khyi sha zos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ drug sde dag gis khra dang /
229a2('dul ba): 'ug pa dang / bya mi sha za ba de dag gi sha yang za ba dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag ma dad pa dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
229a3('dul ba): gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khra dang / 'ug pa dang / mi sha za ba dag gi bya'i sha ma za zhig /dge slong gis khra dang / 'ug pa dang / mi sha za ba
229a4('dul ba): dag gi bya'i sha zos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ ma byin par len pa dag gis yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi dre'u
229a5('dul ba): zhig brkus te khrid nas nags stug po'i nang du bsad de sha khyer nas mgo sug bor te dong ngo / /drug sde rnams chos kyis goms pa ni/ nang bar sngar langs nas khang steng du byung
229a6('dul ba): ste phyogs bzhir bltas nas dud pa gang na che ba dang / bya rgod gang na lding ba phyogs bzhir bltas nas der 'dong ngo / /de dag gis nags stug po na bya rgod lding ba mthong nas de
229a7('dul ba): dag nags stug por rgyug cing rings par dong ba dang / nags stug po de na dre'u'i mgo dang / rkang lag dang / mjug ma dag mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'
229b1('dul ba): bo| rdul khrod pa zhig rnyed na/ blang ngam zhes dang / legs kyi/ blang ngo / /zhes nas de dag gis gcig tu bsdus pa dang / dre'u rdzi yan man tshol bas mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags
229b2('dul ba): pa dag ni/ drang srong gi rgyal mtshan 'dzin na/ ci'i phyir ngan du spyod pa mdzad/ nged cag gis ci zhig nyes zhes smras pa dang / rgyal po'i dre'u ni/ khyed cag gis bsad do/ /zhes smras pa dang /
229b3('dul ba): sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig /nged cag ni/ mi gsod do/ /'o na sus bsad ces pa dang / ma byin par len pa dag gis bsad de/ nged cag gis ni/ mgo dang / rkang pa dang / mjug ma dag
229b4('dul ba): rdul khrod par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de dag gis/ ci/ 'phags pa khyed cag dre'u sha bsnams sam zhes smras pa dang / za'o/ /zhes smras pas/ de dag 'phya bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur
229b5('dul ba): pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dge slong dag srog chags dre'u'i sha zos pa ni/ nyes pa'i dmigs su
229b6('dul ba): 'gyur te/ de bas na/ dge slong dag gis srog chags rmig zlum gyi sha ma za zhig /de ste zos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ drug sde
229b7('dul ba): dag gis wa'i sha zos pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ 'di ci lags/ wa'i sha'o/ /ci/ 'phags pa dag kyang wa'i sha bsnams sam/ za'o/ /
230a1('dul ba): zhes smras pa dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
230a2('dul ba): dge slong dag /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ dge slong dag /de bas na/ wa'i sha ma za zhig /dge slong dag gis wa'i sha zos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur
230a3('dul ba): ro| |gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dze ta'i tshal na spre'u zhig shing kha nas shing khar rgyu ba las lhung nas dus 'das te/ drug sde dag gis rdze'u zhig gi nang du bcug ste 'tshed
230a4('dul ba): pa dang | bud med gzhan zhig bu chung ngu zhig stor nas de tshol zhing dze ta'i tshal du 'ongs na/ drug sde rnams rdze'u'i nang du spre'u 'tshed pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas des drug sde dag gis
230a5('dul ba): bdag gi bu 'dir ma btsos sam snyam bsam ste rtog pa la zhugs pa dang / ji tsam zhig na lhung lhung khol ba dang / spre'u'i lag pa gyen du byung ba dang / de brang brdungs te kyi
230a6('dul ba): hud bu |kyi hud bu zhes smras pa dang / de'i rkang pa yang byung ste kyi hud bu/ kyi hud bu zhes yang smras pa dang / drug sde dag gis ci'i phyir de ltar byed ces smras pa dang / des rkang
230a7('dul ba): lag byung ba 'di ni/ bdag gi bu'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / ji tsam nas mjug ma yang byung ngo / /drug sde dag gis/ ci/ khyod kyi bu la mjug ma yod dam zhes smras pa dang / 'phags
230b1('dul ba): pa| 'di ni/ spre'u'am/ de dag gis smras pa/ spre'u'o/ /'phags pa dag /spre'u'i sha yang bsnams sam/ des za'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge
230b2('dul ba): slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /spre'u ni/ mi sha dang 'dra'i/ de bas na/ dge slong dag spre'u'i sha ma za zhig /
230b3('dul ba): dge slong dag gis spre'u'i sha zos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// //mdor na/ phor bu gos dang 'phags
230b4('dul ba): pa dang / /'dab ma'i phor bur mi sbyin no/ /lcags kyi sbu gu ma gtogs par/ /nor bu 'khar bas btang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med
230b5('dul ba): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na mnyan du yod pa na dge slong gzhan zhig na ste/ de rab tu nad kyis gzir nas de sman pa'i drung du song ste nad med cig /ces nas
230b6('dul ba): bzhin bzang / bdag ni/ rnam pa 'di lta bu zhig na bar gyur na/ sman gyi thabs stob cig /ces smras pa dang / sman pas/ 'phags pa/ mas btang ba'i sman gyis shig /ces smras
230b7('dul ba): pa dang / des/ bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / 'phags pa/ khyed kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can lags kyi/ rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro//
231a1('dul ba): zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sman pas bsgos
231a2('dul ba): la des sos par 'gyur na/ mas btang ba byos shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis mas btang ba'i sman thong zhig /ces gsungs pa dang / de dag gis
231a3('dul ba): phor bus blugs pa dang / bo ste ma rungs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phor bus ma blugs shig /ces gsungs pa dang / gos kyi mtha' mas blugs pa dang /
231a4('dul ba): de'ang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos kyi mtha' mas ma blugs shig /ces gsungs na/ pags pa'i nang nas blugs pa dang /

231a6('dul ba): te| de'ang nyes dmigs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dab ma'i phor bu'i nang nas ma blugs par spu gu'i nang nas blugs par gyis shig /des
231a7('dul ba): lcags kyi spu gu nas blugs pa dang / de nang du bcug na rab tu tsha zhing rtsub par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lcags kyi spu gu ma gtogs par nor bu'i
231b1('dul ba): sbu gu'am/ 'khar ba'i sbu gus gtang bar gyis shig /rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// //dor na/ bu ram shing dang zho zhag 'bru mar dang / /gso
231b2('dul ba): ma bsregs pa'i thug pa dang ni mar/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu sdong bu lo mar bcas/ /thug pa thams cad blud par bya/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med

231b7('dul ba): bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong zhig na bar gyur nas sman pas mthong ste/ 'phags pa/ gso ma'i thug pa byos la
232a1('dul ba): 'thung zhig / ces smras pa dang / des de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan

232a3('dul ba): yang na bar gyur nas de dag kha cig la ni/ sman pas yungs kar gyi thug pa 'thung zhig /ces bsgo'o/ /kha cig la ni/ rtsa ba'i thug pa 'thung zhig /ces bsgo'o/ /kha cig la ni/ sdong
232a4('dul ba): bu'i thug pa 'thung zhig / ces bsgo'o/ /kha cig la ni/ 'bras bu'i thug pa 'thung zhig /ces bsgo ba dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang

232a7('dul ba): bsngo ba dang / /rjes su phan gdags myang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom
232b1('dul ba): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te ljongs spyod cing gshegs pa dang / de dag ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin te ri brag gi grong de na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa
232b2('dul ba): de gdul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das ri brag gi grong der byon pa dang / khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas de dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung
232b3('dul ba): du 'ongs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos de
232b4('dul ba): lta bu bshad nas khyim bdag des thos pa dang / 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/ /ji tsam na dge slong de
232b5('dul ba): dag lam gyis ngal bas gzir nas log pa'i lha khang dang / bkad sa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / shing drung dag tu glos phab ste nyal zhing 'khod pa dang / khyim bdag de rab tu dad pa thob
232b6('dul ba): pas na| bkad sa dang / lha khang dang / shing drung dag tu rim gyis dge slong dag la phyag bya ba'i phyir song ba dang / dge slong dag gnas na nyal zhing 'dug pa des mthong nas 'phags pa

233a1('dul ba): phyogs spyod par yang mi nus so/ /zhes smras pa dang / des 'phags pa rnams/ de ltar na/ phyi dro bu ram gsol bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag

233a3('dul ba): ra tra si dag gis bu ram bza' ba la brten nas des dgra bcom pa mngon du gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du rjes su gnang na/ bdag cag ni/ lam gyi ngal bas gzir

233b4('dul ba): du mgron du bos pa der de las gzhan du'ang mgron du bos sam/ de las lhag par yang rung ste/ gcig tu ni/ bdag nyid/ gnyis su ni/ bdag gi sems btang nas gzhan btang

234a3('dul ba): zo la 'di skad du/ khyim bdag/ dge slong dag zas kyis brel te/ 'di la sbyin gyi/ rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /ces smros shig /de bzhin du gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ ji snyed

235a6('dul ba): dge slong zhig gis 'bru mar sbyar la/ 'di zhes bya ba zhig gis mar sbyar gyi/ de'i gan du song dang / gal te sbyar ba de'i lhag ma yod kyang srid do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag
235a7('dul ba): gi drung du song nas bslangs na/ de dag gis/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de zhag bdun las 'das te spangs par gyur pas med do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras
235b1('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad pa'i thabs rtogs la/ mar ram/ 'bru mar gzhan ci yang rung / bzhag

235b3('dul ba): du ma byed cig / ces bka' stsal na/ byin len byed pa med do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byin len byed pa'i mi med na/ byin len ma byas kyang bla'i/ zo zhig /gang gi
235b4('dul ba): tshe na pa na gnang ba de/ sos na ma spyod cig /spyad na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa

235b6('dul ba): so| |yang zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yul yangs pa can na mi rung ba rnam pa bcu spongs la/ rung ba'i khang pa byin gyis brlabs par gyis shig /ces bka' stsal na/
235b7('dul ba): ci btsun pa/ khang pa 'og rung bar byin gyis brlabs na/ khang pa'i steng yang rung bar byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ ji ltar steng gi bzhin du ngos kyi yang brjod par bya'o/ /
236a1('dul ba): rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// //mdor na/ rtsa sdong lo ma 'bras bu rnams/ /thams cad chang gis spags pa dang / /kha
236a2('dul ba): zas med par bkrus pa dang / /yang na zas ngan de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i dngos po shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po zas
236a3('dul ba): gtsang ma'i shAkya'i rigs re re zhing yang shAkya lnga brgya zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yog tu phul ba dang / de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung ngo / /de dag sngon lus chang
236a4('dul ba): gis gsos pas na/ de dag chang med nas lus la nad zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/
236a5('dul ba): kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir na shAkya dag rnyi rnyi por gyur ces bka' stsal pa dang / de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
236a6('dul ba): pa| de ltar na/ ngas gnang ba ni/ chang du 'gyur ba rtsa ba dang / sdong bu la sogs pa bskams la phye mar bgyis te ras dkar po'i nang du thum por gyis la chang gi mthu zhil pa
236a7('dul ba): rdza ma ma gang ba'i nang du lugs shig / de nas slar phyung ste lag pa khrus la chu kha zas med pa dang bsres te 'dang par tshogs la 'thung zhig /de skom na/ snga dro yang rung / phyi dro
236b1('dul ba): yang rung ste/ the tshom ma byed par 'thung zhig /de ltar byos dang / de dag chang la sred pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong khyed ston pa nga la dmigs na ni/ chang ma 'thung zhig /ma blud cig/
236b2('dul ba): rtswa mchog gis kyang ma reg cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas de la sman pas zas ngan pa byin cig ces bsgo ba dang / de la dge slong kha
236b3('dul ba): cig gis ni/ shes kyi/ kha cig gis mi shes pa de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa u pa li la dris pa dang / des de dag zhib tu smras so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa
236b4('dul ba): lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong swa sti la zas ngan pa byin cig ces gsungs pa ni/ ci/ de yang byin len bgyi 'tshal lam/ u pa li/ de yang byin len byos
236b5('dul ba): shig / su las byin len bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ dge bsnyen dad pa las so/ /rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa ste/ sgo dang po rdzogs so// //mdor bsdus
236b6('dul ba): par na/ snod dang chos gos gnyi ga dang / /ko sa la dang gsar pa de bzhin te/ /bsgrags dang chos gos sna tshogs dang / /lhan cig pa yang dge slong ma rnams ni/ /tha mar byas te bsdus
236b7('dul ba): pa'i mdor gsungs so/ /mdor na/ snod dang yo byad gtsug lag khang / /'gron pa mang bcom gos rnams dang / /gos dang gdugs dang de bzhin shing / /dur khrod pa dang de bzhin
237a1('dul ba): spangs/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na khyim bdag gzhan
237a2('dul ba): zhig gis ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig tu yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo/ /de na mal stan
237a3('dul ba): dang / snod spyad mang du gyur/ dge slong ni/ nyung du gnas te/ de'i nang nas kha cig gis tshe dang ldan pa dag /mal stan dang / snod spyad dang / yo byad dag ma spyad na/ de dag chud

237a5('dul ba): nas de dag gis de bzhin du byas so/ /ji tsam zhig na bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod cing gtsug lag khang der 'ongs pa dang / dge slong de dag gis ngal bsor
237a6('dul ba): bcug nas de'ang dge 'dun de dag gi nang na rgan pa zhig ste/ gtsug lag khang du lam gyi ngal bsos nas des de dag la/ tshe dang ldan pa/ mal stan mchis sam zhes smras na/

237b1('dul ba): dang | lde mig khyer nas khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang / de nas khyim bdag des de la bde bar byon tam zhes pa'i tshig brjod nas stan khyer te phyir byung ba dang / bsod snyoms
237b2('dul ba): pa de spyod lam zhi ba'i tshul du 'dug go / bsod snyoms pas kyang de la nor las bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun gyi yon tan rgyas par brjod pa dang / khyim bdag gis/ 'phags
237b3('dul ba): pa| bdag gis de thams cad bgyis so/ /zhes smras pa dang / bsod snyoms pas/ khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang na mal stan dag yod med de/ mdang nga yang gding ba med par
237b4('dul ba): sa'i steng na de bzhin du nyal nyal te 'dir 'ongs so/ /khyod na re/ de thams cad bdag gis de bzhin du bgyis so/ /zhes zer na/ 'di ci nyes zhes smras pa dang / khyim bdag gis/

237b6('dul ba): smras pa dang / des khyim bdag nyid kyi gtsug lag khang gi lde mig kyog po dang / lde mig gi ngo shes sam zhes smras pa dang / 'phags pa/ shin tu 'tshal to/ /des de bstan pa dang /

238a1('dul ba): pa| bdag gi 'dir mal stan dang / snod spyad dang / yo byad mang du phul na/ de dag gar mchis zhes smras pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad khyim

242b6('dul ba): bdag des ras yug brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum zhig rgan rim gyi mdun du bzhag go / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas dge slong ma dag gis de la gzhan byar ci yod/ sngon yang
242b7('dul ba): dge 'dun sde gnyis bshos gsol ba las bdag cag gis rnyed pa'i phyed thob na/ da yang bdag cag la rnyed pa'i phyed byin cig /ces smras so/ /de lta bur gar pa dge slong dag gis bcom
243a1('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang du dge slong ma mang la dge slong pha nyung na/ der rnyed pa dge 'dun gnyi gar bgos shig /gang
243a2('dul ba): na dge slong pha mang la dge slong ma nyung na/ der mgo grangs bzhin du bgos shig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
243a3('dul ba): dag bshos la spyan drangs so/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun dag ni/ dong / bcom ldan 'das ni/ gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ bshos tshur mnos so/ /rnam pa lnga'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom
243a4('dul ba): ldan 'das gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bshos mnos te gsol lo/ /lnga gang zhe na/ lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed pa yin/ nad pa dag gzigs par bzhed pa yin/ mal stan dag

243a7('dul ba): nas de rgan rim du mar dang / mar la btsos pa'i bca' ba rnams brims/ bar ma dag la ni/ 'bru mar dang / 'bru mar la btsos pa'i bca' ba dag brims/ gzhon nu la ni/ 'bru mar gyi tshigs
243b1('dul ba): ma dag brims so/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos mnos te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos mnos nas 'ongs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra
243b2('dul ba): gcan 'dzin la dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bsod pa'i zas kyis tshim par byas sam zhes smras pa dang / des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ rgan pa rnams tshim mo/ /sgra gcan 'dzin/ khyod ci'i phyir
243b3('dul ba): ring cing nyam chung zhing de skad zer ba smros shig / des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'bru mar gyis ni mthur gyur te/ /mar gyis kyang ni mdangs su 'gyur/ /'bru mar tshigs kyi tshod mas ni/ /mdangs
243b4('dul ba): mchis stobs lta ga la zhig / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan 'dzin/ ci yin pa de smros shig /des de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
243b5('dul ba): kyis sgra gcan 'dzin la/ de na gnas brtan su zhig 'dug /ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ mkhan po mchis so/ /sgra gcan 'dzin la/ dge slong shA ri'i bus ni/ 'og ma dag ma
243b6('dul ba): brtags pas na/ ngan du zos pa yin na/ de lta bu'i byung ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bsdus nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting ba la bzhugs te nyan
243b7('dul ba): thos rnams la 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas bca' ba'i phyir dge slong dag / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gi mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos ngas bca' ste/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong
244a1('dul ba): gis zas 'brim pa'i tshe snyoms par brims shig / ces sgos shig /des tshad ma sna re re la'ang smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lan tshwa
244a2('dul ba): 'am| dang por gang brims pa de'i tshe smros shig / thams cad la ni/ ma yin no/ /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gis ji ltar bur mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos bzhin ma byas na/ 'das
244a3('dul ba): pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis zan zos pa smad do/ /zhes thos nas des bdag ston pas zan zes pa smad na/ 'di ltar 'dug
244a4('dul ba): pa mi rigs so/ /zhes bsam nas des bskyugs te btang ngo / /dge slong dag /the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom
244a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la zan zos pa smad pa dang / des slar bskyugs pa la gzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di 'ba'
244a6('dul ba): zhig ma yin gyi/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas de la zan zos pa la smad pa dang / des phyir bskyugs so/ /dge slong dag nyon cig /de sngon byung ba ni/ grong khyer gzhan zhig na mang por 'chad
244a7('dul ba): pa'i bram ze zhig gnas te/ de bram ze'i bu dang lhan cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa na/ ri brag gi grong zhig tu phyin nas des rdzing zhig gi 'gram du bram ze des bram ze'i bu der bzhag nas cung
244b1('dul ba): zad cig sdod/ nga grong du phye la sogs pa bslangs te slar 'ong ngo / /de de na 'dug pa dang / khyi sha can zhig rdzing du chu brog 'thung du 'ongs so/ /de la bram ze'i bus kye skyes bu/ bdag kyang chu brog
244b2('dul ba): cig stsol cig / ces smras so/ /des kyang lo ma la snod drubs shig ces smras pa dang / des snod drubs so/ /des de la khyi'i pags pa la byas pa'i sgye'u'i nang nas byung ba'i phye byin no/ /de snum pa
244b3('dul ba): dang bram ze'i bus phye 'di snum na/ ci zhig ces dris pa dang / 'di ni/ pags pa la sgye'u byas pa'i mthu ste/ des sgye'u de dag ci la byas pa zhib mor byas na/ bram ze'i bu des ma go'o/ /
244b4('dul ba): bram ze de slar 'ongs nas des/ bram ze'i bu/ khyod song la chu brog rgyu slongs shig ces smras pa dang / des kyang chu brog 'tshal lags so/ /zhes smras pa dang / sus byin/ mi pha bis byin no/ /
244b5('dul ba): des pha bi khyi sha can te/ des khyod la phye byin na/ de khyod kyis sdig par gyur to/ /zhes smras nas des de la smad pa dang / des zos pa slar bskyugs so/ /dge slong dag /mi shes sam/ gang
244b6('dul ba): mang po 'chad pa'i bram ze de ni/ da ltar nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu de ni/ da ltar gyi dge slong shA ri'i bu ste/ de'i tshe na yang ngas zas pa la rab tu smad nas de slar
244b7('dul ba): bskyugs so/ /da 'dir yang ngas zas zos pa la smad nas 'dir yang slar bskyugs par gyur to/ /gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/ de'i tshes na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag me
245a1('dul ba): skyes kyi sring mo'i khyo gcer bu pa'i dge bsnyen dpal sbed ces bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ khyim bdag me skyes dad pa des 'di snyam du/ dpal sbed 'di dge 'dun dag la yon
245a2('dul ba): 'bul du bskul lo/ /snyam bsam nas des de la dpal sbed/ dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / yon phul cig dang / khyod kyi bsod nams su 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras so/ /dpal sbed kyis smras
245a3('dul ba): pa| ngas kyang dge 'dun dag mchod cing yon dbul bar bya'o/ khyod kyis kyang gang po la sogs te rab tu byung ba'i dge 'dun dag la mchod cing bshos gsol cig /me skyes kyis 'di snyam du
245a4('dul ba): bsam pa/ de ste khas ma blangs na/ dpal sbed kyis dge 'dun la mchod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur na/ sems can thams cad la sbyin pa lta nyes med kyi/ gcer bu pa'i dge 'dun dag la
245a5('dul ba): zan byin te/ bdag gis des dge 'dun la mchod cing yon dbul ba'i ched du bya'o/ /snyam bsam nas des zan sbyin no/ /zhes khas blangs nas dpal sbed kyis 'di snyam du/ bdag gis dang por
245a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dag sngar bshos gsol na ni/ me skyes kyis phyis zan mi sbyin gyi/ gang po la sogs te rab tu byung ba'i dge 'dun dag bshos sngar gsol ba dang /
245a7('dul ba): ngas phyis zan sbyin no/ /snyam bsam nas me skyes la 'di skad ces smras so/ khyod kyis dang po zan byin cig dang / ngas kyang phyis dge slong go'u ta ma dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
245b1('dul ba): dag la zan sbyin no/ /des kyang khas blangs nas de nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis gang po dag gang na 'dug pa der phyin nas gang po dang lhan cig rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba'i gtam sna tshogs dag byas nas
245b2('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang po/ khyod sang bdag gi khyim du gcer bu pa mang po dang / dge 'dun dang lhan
245b3('dul ba): cig tu bshos gsol gyi/ khas longs shig /gang pos bsam pa/ khyim bdag 'di ni/ gor ma chag par dge sbyong go'u ta ma la sun par gyur nas bdag cag la rab tu dad par gyur te/ de ni
245b4('dul ba): bdag cag gi rnyed pa rab tu rnyed pa ste/ gang po bdag cag gi dge 'dun gyi rigs la rab tu dad par gyur to/ /snyam nas des khas blangs so/ /de nas khyim bdag me skyes de dag spyan drangs nas
245b5('dul ba): song ngo| |de nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis de'i nub mo rab tu bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba'i kha zas dag sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te sngar langs nas stan bting / ril ba dag chus
245b6('dul ba): bkang ste bzhag nas gang po dag la spyan 'dren pas dus gsol pa/ kye gang po/ bshos rnams bshams kyi/ dus mkhyen par mdzod cig /de dag dong ba dang / dpal sbed kyis de'i gan du
245b7('dul ba): 'ongs te smras pa/ 'phags pa gang po/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ khyim bdag gi khyim du bzhud de/ de nang du bzhud kar sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag nas 'dzum pa ston te/ de nas nyan thos kun
246a1('dul ba): dga' bo zhes bya bas stod g.yogs phyogs gcig tu gzar/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin
246a2('dul ba): gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag ni/ rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ btsun pa/ ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen gyis na/ 'dzum pa mdzad ces zhus pa dang / des kyang kun
246a3('dul ba): dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad de/ ji
246a4('dul ba): lta bur dgongs pa bzhin lung ston to/ /zhes smras nas de la skye bo mang po dag kyang rab tu dad par gyur gyi/ khyod kyis kyang khyim bdag me skyes kyi khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe de ltar bya ba'i rigs
246a5('dul ba): so/ /'on kyang skye bo mang po dag rab tu dad par 'gyur ro/ /des khas blangs so/ /de nas gang po gcer bu pa mang pos bskor nas khyim bdag me skyes kyi khyim du phyin pa dang / khyim bdag me
246a6('dul ba): skyes kyi sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag ste rta gad du bgad pa dang / de'i nang nas gcer bu pa zhig gis rkang pa la btud de/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu rgyu med rkyen med par
246a7('dul ba): 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /zhes dris pa dang / kye/ chu bo dregs bral gyi 'gram na spre'u pho zhig gis spre'u mo zhig mthong nas de la sems rab tu chags te spre'u mo de la brgal
246b1('dul ba): lo/ /snyam nas brgyugs pa dang / dred de shing gi rtse mo nas rdeg 'chos nas dus 'das so/ /de'i tshe na nga 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba cher
246b2('dul ba): gyur to/ /snyam mo/ /de skad du kha nas byung ma thag tu khyim bdag me skyes kyis thos nas des bsam pa/ bu zan mo'i bu gang po ni/ khab 'tshong pa slar khab rdung pa'i khyim du khab tshong par sems
246b3('dul ba): pa bzhin te/ ci nas 'di la kyal ka zhig bya'o/ /snyam nas de nas dbyug gu can mang po thams cad bde bar 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bca' ba dang / bza' bas
246b4('dul ba): phor pa bkang nas steng du tshod ma blugs te byin no/ /gang po gcig pu la ni/ phor pa'i zhabs su tshod ma blugs nas steng du 'bras kyis g.yogs te byin no/ /gcer bu pa phal dag za zhing 'dug pa
246b5('dul ba): dang / gang pos bsam pa/ gor ma chag par des ni/ nga la ston par dmigs te/ des tshod ma zhim po dang / kha zas bzang po sbyin par bsam mo/ /snyam nas ji tsam tshod ma brims zin pa dang /
246b6('dul ba): des bsam pa/ de ni/ brel bas brjed kyi/ bdag gis bskul lo/ /snyam nas des bos nas khyim bdag /nga la ni/ 'bras chan 'ba' zhig 'ongs kyi/ tshod ma ni/ med do/ /zhes smras pa
246b7('dul ba): dang / des slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mi mthong ba ni mthong bar byed/ /mthong bar bya ba mi mthong ste/ /dregs bral 'gram gyi spre'u mthong la/ /phor bu'i nang ga tshod ma min/ /gang po
247a1('dul ba): yang de'i gdong bltas pa dang / des phor bu'i zhabs na tshod ma 'dug pa bstan te/ gang po/ khyod kyis chu bo dregs bral gyi 'gram na spre'u 'dug pa ni/ mthong / phor bu'i nang na
247a2('dul ba): tshod ma 'dug pa ma mthong ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / des bsam pa/ 'dis bdag skyengs par byas kyi/ ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar phan par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin pa'i
247a3('dul ba): yon tan brjod do/ /snyam du bsam pa dang / me skyes kyis de skyengs par shes nas sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i tshe de'i mdun na mi 'dug go/ /des zan zos nas sbyin pa'i yon tan bklags
247a4('dul ba): pa/ sbyin bdag gis ni sbyin pa'i dus/ /dge sbyong gzhan ni za ba'i dus/ /lhag ma gzhan la 'ongs pa'i dus/ /bsod nams mi dge yod ma yin/ /sgo ba zhig 'dug pa des sbyin pa'i yon tan
247a5('dul ba): brjod pa la nyan nyan te thos nas khros pa/ 'di 'dra ba'i sdig can zan zos pa la srung yang mi nus te/ 'di 'dra ba'i sbyin pa'i yon tan lta ga la srid kyi/ bu zan mo'i bu 'di la kyal ka zhig bya'o/ /snyam
247a6('dul ba): nas des 'bras khu bum pa gang sgo drung du pho'o/ /sgo gtan gyi gdang phyed tsam drangs te bzhag pa dang / gcer bu pa phyir byung ba dang / 'bras khu las dred de klad pa sgo gtan la phog nas khrag byung ngo / /de
247a7('dul ba): nas sgo ba des mthong ste tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sgo gtan phyung ba'i dus la bab/ /'bras khu pho ba'i dus bab pas/ /mgo bo snad pa'i dus yin gyi/ /dge dang mi dge'i dus med do/ /de
247b1('dul ba): klad pa la khrag zag bzhin du khyim bdag dpal sbed gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / dpal sbed kyis mthong nas btsun pa gang po/ 'di ci nyes zhes dris pa dang / des smras pa/ me skyes kyis 'di
247b2('dul ba): 'dra ba'i gnod pa byas so/ /dpal sbed kyis smras pa/ khyed ni/ gson por thar gyi/ sdod cig dang / ci nas 'di ltar dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa kho bo'i khyim nas
247b3('dul ba): gson bzhin du phyir mi 'byung bar bya'i/ mi dgar ma byed cig /dpal sbed kyis bsam pa/ 'di'i dgra la lan glan gyi/ spyan drang du 'gro'o/ /de ste dge sbyong go'u ta ma de thams cad mkhyen
247b4('dul ba): pa yin na ni/ mgron du bos kyang khas len du mi btub bo/ /de ste thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin na ni/ khas len to/ /snyam du bsam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
247b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag dpal sbed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
247b6('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye go'u ta ma/ sang bdag gi khyim du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig bshos la gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes shig /ces spyan drangs pa dang / bcom ldan
247b7('dul ba): 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gang gis nga las bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'di ltar byed do/ /de ste ngas khas ma blangs na ni bden pa'i bar chad dag tu 'gyur te/ ci nas khas blang ngo / /snyam nas
248a1('dul ba): gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /dpal sbed kyis bsam pa/ 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin te/ de ste thams cad mkhyen pa yin na ni/ 'di ltar
248a2('dul ba): khas mi len pa'i rigs na/ ci nas 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur bar dgra'i lan glan no/ /snyam nas de nas de'i khyim du song ste/ de'i khyim gyi sgo khar dong chen po brkos
248a3('dul ba): nas nang du shing ka di de'i me mdag dud pa med pas bkang nas de'i steng du rtswas g.yogs nas sas bkab ste bzhag go / dug rnon pos bza' ba dang / btung ba sbyar to/ /de nas me skyes
248a4('dul ba): kyi sring mos dpal sbed la jo bo ci zhig mdzad ces dris pa dang / des smras pa/ dgra gsad par bya'o/ /jo bo la dgra su mchis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'o/ /de ste jo bo khyod kyi dgra bcom ldan 'das
248a5('dul ba): yin na/ mdza' bo su zhig mchis kyi/ jo bo 'di lta bu 'phags pa'i chos ma yin pa'i las bya bar mi rigs par soms shig /ces smras pa dang / de nas dpal sbed kyis bsam pa/
248a6('dul ba): 'di'ang me skyes kyi gnyen du 'ong ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la dad pas na gsang shor bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas des mo mdzod kyi nang du bcug ste sgo lcags bcug ste bzhag go /gang po
248a7('dul ba): la sogs pa gcer bu pa thams cad bos nas ngas dgra gsad pas bltar shog cig / dge sbyong go'u ta ma gsad pa'i phyir sgor dong chen po brkos nas nang du seng ldeng gi me mdag gis bkang
248b1('dul ba): ste bzhag / kha zas dang skom gyi nang du dug rnon pos bkang ngo / /de dag yid rab tu dga' nas myur zhing rings su dong ste yang thog gi steng du 'dzegs te 'khod nas deng bdag cag bde bar 'khod do/ /
248b2('dul ba): dge sbyong go'u ta ma me'i dong gi nang du ji ltar tshig pa dang / dug rnon pos rab tu zhen pa dang / yan man dus la ji ltar 'gyel ba dag la blta'o/ /dpal sbed kyis gdan bting nas bcom ldan
248b3('dul ba): 'das la spyan 'dren pas dus gsol to/ /go'u ta ma bshos kyang sbyar lags kyi/ kye go'u ta ma dus la bab par dgongs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
248b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod song la dge slong dag la 'di skad du/ dpal sbed kyi khyim du de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par dge slong su'ang sngar ma 'dong zhig /ces sgos
248b5('dul ba): shig / btsun pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la mnyan te dge slong dag la/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sbed kyi khyim du
248b6('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par sngar dge slong su'ang ma 'dong zhig / ces bka' stsal to/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed
248b7('dul ba): dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong mang pos bskor nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du byas te dpal sbed kyi khyim ga na bar de logs su gshegs so/ /de nas 'od ma'i tshal na gnas
249a1('dul ba): pa'i lha bran rnams sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' bas gzir te myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
249a2('dul ba): la gtugs te snying rje ba'i tshig gis 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ dpal sbed kyi khyim du gshegs par mi rigs so/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
249a3('dul ba): pa/ lha/ de na gnod pa ci zhig yod/ bcom ldan 'das/ dpal sbed ni/ bcom ldan 'das la ma rung par bgyi ba'i slad du bshams so/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
249a4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gnod pa thams cad dang bral na/ des nga la gnod pa ci zhig byar yod/ lha bran gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom
249a5('dul ba): ldan 'das des dgrongs pa'i slad du dong chen po'i nang du seng ldeng gi me mdag gis bkang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha/ gang 'dod chags kyi me
249a6('dul ba): dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi me dag kyang ye shes kyi chus btab na zhi bar 'gyur na/ me'i nang na tha ma des ci zhig byar yod kyi/ mya ngan ma byed par 'dug cig /lha bran gyis gsol pa/
249a7('dul ba): de gcig pu ma lags kyi/ gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i slad du bya bar sbyar te/ dug rnon po mi bzad pas kha zas dang / btung ba'i nang du sbyar to/ /zhes smras pa dang /
249b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha/ dug gi gnyen po ye shes kyis 'dod chags kyi dug dang / zhe sdang gi dug dang / gti mug gi dug kyang rab tu btang / rab tu bskyugs/ rab tu bor na/
249b2('dul ba): dug gi nang na tha ma des byar ci zhig yod/ bdag slar log la bdag gi las la nan tan du byos shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu byon pa dang / rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i lha
249b3('dul ba): dag gis snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang / lha de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis lha snga ma bzhin du bsgos te slar bkye'o/ /de nas dpal sbed kyi khang pa'i sgor byon pa dang / dpal sbed kyi khyim gyi lhas
249b4('dul ba): snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag kyang snga ma bzhin du bsgos te slar bkye'o/ /de nas dpal sbed kyi chung mas bsam pa/ da ni/ bcom ldan 'das sgo dang por phyin cing /
249b5('dul ba): da tsam ni/ dong gi steng du zhabs bzhag go /da tsam ni/ dong gi kha rtswas g.yogs pa'i steng nas lhung ngo / /da tsam ni/ bcom ldan 'das me'i nang du lhung nas dud pas kyang 'tshal/ mchi ma yang
249b6('dul ba): byung / me lces chos gos tshig pa'i dud pa yang byung ngo / /snyam nas mi dga' ba des khang pa'i nang du bcug pas yid mi dga' ba skyes nas mig mchi mas gang zhing ngo 'dzum gnas nas rtags mi
249b7('dul ba): dge ba la rtog ste ngu zhing 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad la phan pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i yid kyis sgo bar mar byon nas me dong gi steng du zhabs bzhag pa dang / de
250a1('dul ba): nas me'i dong gi steng du zhabs bzhag ma thag tu de thams cad mtshe'u pad+ma can du gyur te/ ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dag gis ni/ khebs
250a2('dul ba): bya ngang pa dang / ka rand dang / ngur pa la sogs pa chu na spyod pa'i bya rnams kyis brgyan te/ bya de dag kyang skad sna tshogs 'byin pa ni/ ji ltar lha'i rdzing man da ka bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la
250a3('dul ba): gnas pa'i lha dag gis kyang lha'i me tog ku mu da dang / lha'i me tog kha tog dang ldan pas steng nas gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i steng dag tu zhabs bzhag ste dpal sbed
250a4('dul ba): kyi khyim du byon pa dang / khyim bdag dpal sbed ngo mtshar che ba'i mig gis bgrad de bltas nas/ btsun pa gang po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la ltos shig /ces smras
250a5('dul ba): pa dang / gang po mi dga' ba'i bzhin du bsgyur nas/ khyim bdag /dge slong go'u ta ma dad dam/ de'i sgyu ma la dad dam zhes smras pa dang / dpal sbed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po/
250a6('dul ba): de ltar 'di lta bus bsgrub tu rung na ni/ khyod kyang thams cad mkhyen pa na sgyu ma de lta bu byos la ston cig /de lta bus nga dang / nga'i mdza' bo dang / phu nu dag kyang bsgrub par gyis shig /gang
250a7('dul ba): pos bsam pa/ dgos pa ma grub par gyur te/ slar 'gro'o/ /snyam nas des de la spyos te khang pa'i steng nas babs te skyengs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du 'byung bar ma nus te/ de
250b1('dul ba): nas 'gros dal zhing bags kyis song nas gdong yang sa la bltas te dpal sbed kyi khyim nas byung ste bros te song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag dpal sbed khyim bdag me skyes kyi sring mo gang na ba der song ste
250b2('dul ba): phyin nas sgo lcags phye ste/ bzang mo tshur shog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag tshol cig /ces smras pa dang / des bsam pa/ 'di bdag slu bar byed do/ /snyam nas snying rje
250b3('dul ba): ba'i tshig gis dal bus smras pa/ sdig pa'i grogs pos bslus te bsad na/ bdag la bgam du ci zhig yod ces smras pa dang / des/ bzang mo bden par zer te/ bgam pa ni/ ma yin gyi/
250b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dgrongs par ma nus pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du 'byung bar mi nus kyi/ nga khrid la song zhig ces smras pa dang / des dpal sbed kyi chung ma de dga' ba skyes nas mgu
250b5('dul ba): ba'i yid kyis dpal sbed khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
250b6('dul ba): btsun pa/ bzod pa mdzod cig /khyim bdag 'di/ mi dge ba'i grogs pos bslus pas na/ bcom ldan 'das la mi dge ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag bgyis so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de nas bcom
250b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i sna 'dra ba'i phyag brkyangs nas gsungs pa/ khyim bdag /longs shig dang bzod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ mdza' ba dang / dgrar bye brag mi 'byed/ de
251a1('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ mdza' ba dang dgrar bye brag mi 'byed/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur mtshungs so/ /zhes smras pa
251a2('dul ba): dang | de nas khyim bdag dpal sbed de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' ba skyes nas mos pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la cung zad cig gzhes shig / bdag gis bshos de
251a3('dul ba): gdod sbyar ro/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa la spyan 'dren pas dus gsol to/ /go'u ta ma bshos dag sbyar lags
251a4('dul ba): kyi| kye go'u ta ma dus mkhyen par mdzod cig / ces zer na/ da yang ci'i phyir na/ 'di skad du smra/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mi dge ba'i grogs po la bltas par gyur
251a5('dul ba): pa'i blos log par lta ba gsum du 'gro ba'i sdig pas de la gzhol te kun la sdug par 'gro ba gnyis kyang bgags nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod par bya ba'i phyir zhugs so/ /zhes
251a6('dul ba): smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gnod pa thams cad dang bral na/ ci'i phyir nga la gnod par 'gyur/ btsun pa/

251b1('dul ba): chags kyi dug dang / zhe sdang gi dug dang / gti mug gi dug kyang rab tu bskyugs shing bor na/ dug ngan pa 'di lta bus ci zhig byar yod kyi/ gang sbyar ba de khyer te shog cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das
251b2('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting ba la bzhugs te/ bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong dag la 'di skad du/ nam rgan rim
251b3('dul ba): du 'byor tshogs so/ /zhes skad ma byung gi bar du su yang zan ma za zhig par sgos shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong dag la/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
251b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa ni/ rgan rim du 'byor tshogs so/ /zhes skad ma byung gi bar du su'ang ma za zhig ces byung ngo / /de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bde bar 'khod nas kha zas dag bsnyen pa
251b5('dul ba): dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyis dpal sbed kyi khyim rgan rim du 'byor tshogs zhes skad phyung ba dang / kha zas dang / skom dag kyang dug med par gyur to/ /dpal sbed de dogs bzhin
251b6('dul ba): du kha zas dang / skom dag 'brim zhing bsam pa/ rgan rim nas gzhon nu dag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang / da tsam dge slong rgan rim dag ni/ dug rnon pos 'gyel gor ma chag go/ gzhon nu nas
251b7('dul ba): yang rgan rim gyi drung du 'ongs nas yang 'di snyam du sems te/ de'i blo yang de lta bur skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dug spangs kyi/ nyan
252a1('dul ba): thos thams cad ma yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas/ de ltar dge slong thams cad kyis bshos gsol na/ gcig la yang gnod par ma gyur to/ /chung du na/ de'i lhag
252a2('dul ba): ma zos pa dag la yang gnod par ma gyur/ de nas khyim bdag dpal sbed phyi phyir dad pa skyes so/ /de chung ma dang gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas lhung bzed phyung ste phyag
252a3('dul ba): bcabs par shes nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sbed dang / chung ma'i bsam pa dang / bag

252a5('dul ba): la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/ /des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum smras te/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan
252a6('dul ba): 'das kyis phan btags pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ sdug pa dang / mdza' ba dang / gnyen dang / 'khor gyis kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis
252a7('dul ba): lhas kyang ma bgyis/ snga ma'i pha mes dag gis ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis mchi ma dang / khrag gi rgya mtsho ni/ bskams
252b1('dul ba): rus pa'i ri las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni/ bcad/ mtho ris kyi sgo ni/ phye ste/ bdag ni/ lha dang / mi'i gnas su bzhag go /zhes smras nas yang gsol pa/ nyes pa mang ba ma rungs pa/

252b3('dul ba): bral ba'i/ bdag gi mig ni dag cing rnam par dag /'phags pa dgyes pa'i gnas bzhi thob/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal/ /skye bo lha min lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye ba na ba rga shi
252b4('dul ba): rnam par bral/ /srid pa stong du'ang rnyed par shin tu dka'/ /thub pa khyod mthong dang ni 'bras bur ldan/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par brgal te/ mngon par brgal lo/ /da ni/ bdag
252b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun du skyabs su mchi'i/ deng phan chad nam 'tsho'i bar srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi nas mngon du dad kyi/ bdag dge bsnyen
252b6('dul ba): du zungs shig / btsun pa/ deng phan chad mu stegs can gcer bu pa dang / gcer bu ma dang / gcer bu pa'i nyan thos rnams la ni/ sgo bcad/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dang / dge slong dang /

253a4('dul ba): med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo / /de bas na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong la mtshungs par spyod pa'i chos bca'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gi rgan rim du

253b1('dul ba): mjug sgrub pa'i rigs so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dad pa chung ste/ gtsug lag khang de ni/ che bas na/ de tsam rtsig sus nus kyi/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni/ chen po de bshig la chung ngur

255b1('dul ba): 'das kyis gnang na ni/ sku gzugs gshegs pa'i tshe bdag gis rol mo sbyar ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ de ltar na/ gnang gi /sbyor cig /
255b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis rol mo bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /nam mchod pa'i dus na 'di skad du/ bzhin bzang /

255b4('dul ba): bged pa dad pa dang / mdo yi tshigs su bcad par brjod/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ston

255b6('dul ba): la ma sbran par dong ngo / /de dag gis e ma'o/ /'phags pa dag /nged cag la sngar sbran na ni/ nged kyis yon rnams sta gon bya ba zhig ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom

256a1('dul ba): lam dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu bsgrags par byos shig /de dag gis dus ston no/ /dus ston no/ /zhes bsgrags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhag
256a2('dul ba): dus thob la zhag 'di snyed cig na dus ston byed do/ /zhes sbron cig /de ltar byas kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gro ba la bris la bal glang

256a6('dul ba): pa'i dge slong bskos te dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams tshogs shing 'khod pa dang / sngar ni/ dad par byos shig /khyod ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par bsko na/ dad dam zhes dri ste/
256a7('dul ba): dad na/ des kyang dad do/ /zhes smros shig /de'i 'og tu dge slong zhig gis gsol pa dang las byos shig /gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes
256b1('dul ba): bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par dad na/ de ste dge 'dun gyis dus la bab shing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnong zhig /ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod sbed par bskos te snod sbed pa ming 'di
256b2('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed de/ 'di ni/ gsol pa'o/ /las kyang 'di ltar bya ste/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi smod sbed par
256b3('dul ba): dad de/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ snod sbed par bskos te/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod sbed na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang la ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod
256b4('dul ba): sbed du bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang gis mi bzod pa de dag ni/ smros shig/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod sbed par bskos te dge 'dun gyis bzod
256b5('dul ba): cing gnang bas na/ cang mi gsung ste/ de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /der yang rnyed pa dag mang du byung nas dge slong ma dag gis 'phags pa/ bdag cag la rnyed pa'i skal pa stsol cig /ces
256b6('dul ba): smras kyang / dge slong dag gis ma byin no/ /de dag gis phyi de nyin mo shing rta gzhan zhig bshams pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis 'phags ma dang / shing rta 'di nyid dam/ 'on
256b7('dul ba): te gzhan zhig ces dris nas/ dge slong ma dag gis kyang rnyed pa mang du gyur to/ /dge slong ma dag gis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la ngom par gyur pa dge slong dag gas mthong nas 'phags pa/
257a1('dul ba): khyod kyis kho mo cag la rnyed pa ma byin mod kyi/ bdag cag gis kyang shing rta logs shig tu bshams pas/ bdag cag la rnyed pa yang mang du thob par gyur to/ /
257a2('dul ba): smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong dag /gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni/ dge slong
257a3('dul ba): ma dag gis dus ston gyi tshe shing rta gud du bshams pas de bas na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dag gis shing rta logs shig tu mi bshams par dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
257a4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong mas mi rigs pa byas te/ de bas na/ dge slong mas dus ston gyi tshe shing rta logs shig tu ma shoms shig /dge slong ma dag gis dus ston gyi
257a5('dul ba): tshe shing rta logs shig tu bshams na/ dbyen byas pa dang nye ba'i nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /snod de dag de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas bcom
257a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bgos shig ces gsungs pa dang / de dag gis ji ltar bsgo ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod 'ged pa'i dge slong zhig skos shig /bsko
257a7('dul ba): ba ni/ 'di ltar bya'o/ /stan bting ste gaN+DI brdungs la dris pa la lan ldon pa'i dge slong bskos la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'khod pa dang sngar dad par byos shig /khyod dge 'dun gyi
257b1('dul ba): snod 'ged par bsko na/ dad dam zhes dris la/ de ste dad do/ /zhes zer na/ de'i 'og tu dge slong zhig gis gsol ba dang las byos shig/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ snod 'ged
257b2('dul ba): pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged par dad na/ de ste dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnong la dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod 'ged
257b3('dul ba): par skos shig / ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged de/ 'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las kyang 'di ltar byos shig /gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes bgyi
257b4('dul ba): ba snod 'ged par dad na/ dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged de/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged par tshe dang ldan pa rnams gang bzod pa ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /
257b5('dul ba): gang mi bzod pa de dag ni/ smros shig /dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod 'ged par bskos te/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bas na/ cang mi gsung ste/ de de bzhin
257b6('dul ba): bzhin du 'dzin to/ /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o/ /mdo bar ma ste/ rnam pa tha dad byas dang yon/ /gang gi tshe na gcig la lhag /gang gi tshe na gnyis las
257b7('dul ba): gcig / bdag gir bya bar mi rung ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe dus ston chen po
258a1('dul ba): byung ba na rnyed pa mang po dang ldan par gyur nas dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba'i thabs mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos sbed pa'i dge
258a2('dul ba): slong gis stan things la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa la lan ldon pa'i dge slong bskos la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du btsong par bya'o/ /de dag gis sus rin thang gdab pa ma
258a3('dul ba): shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis thob cig /de dag gis de nyid nyor bcug pa dang / de nyid la nyor ma gzhug cig /dge 'dun gyi
258a4('dul ba): gnas brtan gyis rin cher btab ste sus kyang ma nyos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ cher ma gdab cig /ces gsungs pa dang / shin tu chung du btab bo/ /shin tu
258a5('dul ba): chung ngur yang ma gdab par ran par thob cig / gang gis thog mar rin skyed pa de nyid nyor chug cig /ces smras pa dang / de la ma btsong par gang gi tshe rin thang sus kyang ma skyed na/ gdod
258a6('dul ba): de nyid la tshongs shig / drug sde dag gis rin cher btab ste rin blangs na/ dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir nged kyis rin thang bskyed do/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
258a7('dul ba): stsal pa/ gang nyo ba des rin thang skyed cig /gzhan gyis rin thang bskyed na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag gis rin thang bskyed de nyos nas bkrus shing bgos so//
258b1('dul ba): rin len pa la de nyid slar byin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rin 'ongs kyi bar du de la ma byin cig /rin ma byin par bgos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /rkyang pa'i sgo
258b2('dul ba): gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o/ / //mdor na/ gtsug lag khang ni zhig pa ste/ /lci ba'i phyir ni gzhig par bya/ /nam zhig 'jigs par gyur pa na/ /skad cig
258b3('dul ba): rnyed pa dge 'dun gyi/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gnas
258b4('dul ba): khang lnga brtsegs su byos shig / dri gtsang khang ni/ bdun brtsegs/ sgo khang yang bdun brtsegs su byos shig /ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong ma'i gnas khang ni/ sum brtsegs
258b5('dul ba): so| |dri gtsang khang ni/ lnga brtsegs so/ /sgo khang yang lnga brtsegs so/ /steng gi lcid kyis rtsig pa 'jig tu byed de/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
258b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng ma'i rim gcig phri zhig /'on kyang 'jig par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rim pa gnyis nas bzhi'i
258b7('dul ba): bar du phri la 'og khang gcig pu zhog cig / gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong rnams la 'jigs pa dag byung nas gtsug lag khang stong par byas te dge 'dun gyi mal stan yang
259a1('dul ba): bor nas bros te dong ba dang / ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus so/ /brkus pas dge slong dag phongs par gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom
259a2('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi mal stan bor te ma 'dong zhig /gang du 'dong ba der khyer cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du 'dong bar
259a3('dul ba): khyer cig ces bka' stsal pa/ dge slong zhig gis bgo ba dag khyer te dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu bros te dong ba dang / de na nub mo dge slong zhig gis tshe dang ldan pa/ 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyi
259a4('dul ba): nang na rgan te/ ji ltar rgan rim du dbang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang de byin no/ /des de byin nas ji tsam nam nangs pa dang / des bgo ba 'di khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ gang gi tshe
259a5('dul ba): bgo ba bgos pa de'i tshe na ni/ khyed rgan pos khyer la/ da bkur ba'i tshe na ni/ nga la sbyin nam/ khyod nyid khyer cig /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
259a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis 'jigs pa'i tshe khyer ba de de nyid kyi'o/ /gang gi tshe 'jigs pa med par gyur na yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngo / /zhes slar ma phul
259a7('dul ba): ba dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /re zhig ngas dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag gnang
259b1('dul ba): gi |gtan du ni/ ma yin gyi/ 'jigs pa dang bral na/ slar phul la rgan rim du byin cig /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// //mdor na/ dze ta'i tshal
259b2('dul ba): du mchod ston che/ /rnga chen gyis ni 'du bar bya/ /gral ni 'chol bar 'khod pa dang / /dge slong las ni zhal tar bsgo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon
259b3('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis dus ston chen
259b4('dul ba): po bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /ngas gnang gi /byos shig /de dze ta'i tshal du dus ston chen po byas pa dang / dge slong mang po
259b5('dul ba): 'dus par gyur nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod ston chen po byed pa na gaN+DI dang / rnga dang / dung bus shig dang / dge slong dag gdugs tshod la bab par dus rig par 'gyur ro/ /
259b6('dul ba): zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag /rnga dang dung dag gi sgras brdegs na/ 'chol bar 'khod do/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
259b7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong las zhal ta ba bskos te/ ci nas rgan rim du 'khod pa dang / nam zas dag rgan rim nas brims te/ gzhon nu'i gan du phyin tsam nas gdugs tshod kyang
260a1('dul ba): yol te dge slong dag zas kyi bar chad du gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
260a2('dul ba): lnga brgya phrang du gyis la/ kha zas ni/ rgan rim gyi mdun du zhog cig /dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byas pa dang / khyim bdag ni/ bza' ba dag 'brim pa la rku'o/ /de ltar gyur
260a3('dul ba): pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'brim pa'i spyan pa dge slong skos shig /de dag kyang kha zas kyi bar chad du gyur nas
260a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag sngar dang zan byin la phyis zhal ta byed du chug cig /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// //mdor
260a5('dul ba): na| dge slong ma ni mang du gyur/ /dge slong dang pos rjes yi rang / /gcig dang gnyis dang mang po dang / /bu chung rab tu dag gyur pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon
260a6('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag cig gnas pa des dge slong ma mang zhig bshos la spyan drangs pa dang / ji tsam zhig
260a7('dul ba): na| dge slong gcig cig 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brag gi grong der phyin pa dang / de der bsod snyoms la zhugs na/ de na gzhan zhig gis de la/
260b1('dul ba): 'phags pa/ khyim 'di na dge slong ma dag bshos gsol zhing 'khod kyi/ der bzhud cig ces smras pa dang / de'ang der song na/ dge 'dun ma'i gnas brtan sbom mo dga' ldan 'dug ste/
260b2('dul ba): des 'phags pa/ de ste sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod nus na ni/ rgan rim du bzhugs shig /de ste mi nus na ni/ phyogs gcig tu bshos snoms la bzhud cig /ces smras pa dang / de
260b3('dul ba): skyengs nas des bsam pa/ de ste bdag gis sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod kyi bar du 'dug na ni/ 'gron pa mang po dag kyang dong bar 'gyur gyi/ phyogs gcig tu zan zos te 'gro'o/ /snyam
260b4('dul ba): nas phyogs gcig tu zan zos te song ngo / /rim bzhin du mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang / dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa bde bar 'ongs sam/ ci bde bar spyad dam zhes smras pa dang / des
260b5('dul ba): smras pa/ ga la zhig bde bar spyad/ dge slong mas kyal ka byas so/ /de ji ltar byas zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa rgyas par dge slong dag la smras so/ /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
260b6('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na dge slong gcig dang / dge slong ma gcig pa de na dge slong de gral yang dang po/ chu yang dang po/ zan yang dang por
260b7('dul ba): zo zhig gang na dge slong ma gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ de las kyang lhag pa zhig la dge slong gcig cig 'ongs na/ dge slong gcig pu de lta na yang dang po/ chu yang dang po/ zan yang dang
261a1('dul ba): por zo zhig / gang de ste dge slong ma dag 'ba' zhig na yang rtag tu gral gyi dang por stan gcig lhag par zhog la 'khod cig /de ste dge tshul zhig 'ongs na/
261a2('dul ba): yang de der 'dug la zo zhig /de ste des mi nus par gyur na yang dge slong mas sbyin pa'i yon tan lhogs shig /dge slong mas de ltar ma byas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /
261a3('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas dze ta'i tshal du dus ston chen po byas nas bu dang / chung ma dge 'dun la yon du phul ba dang / dge slong dag
261a4('dul ba): gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag la bris shig /dris pa
261a5('dul ba): dang / pha des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /rin thang chod cig dang / bdag gis blur gsol lo/ /drug sde dag gis de la 'gran cing spel ba la zhugs pa dang / de'i nang nas chung ma bu
261a6('dul ba): chung du can gyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi rkang pa la btud de/ jo bo/ /bdag gi bu chung gi /bdag ma gtang zhig /ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
261a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ sems can gyi nang na bud med las snying chung pa med kyi/ 'jigs par ma bya zhig /de
261b1('dul ba): bas na/ dge slong gis bud med kyi rin thang ma gcod cig /bcad na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin bdag gis ji ltar dga' ste byin pa bzhin du longs shig/ rkyang
261b2('dul ba): pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa rdzogs so/ / //mdor na/ bsdus par na/ yo byad bus pa blun pa dang / /gang gi ba dang de yi ste/ /de ltar khye'u las bslang mi bya/ /mgon
261b3('dul ba): med zas sbyin de bzhin te/ /spu yi gri dang 'khor rnams dang / /chu dang bsdus par gsungs pa'o/ /mdor na/ yo byad rnams dang gnang ba dang / /u pa lis ni dris pa ste/ /ji ltar byin gyis
261b4('dul ba): brlab par bya/ /yid gcugs tshigs bcad mdor gsungs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/
261b5('dul ba): dge slong dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod pas na/ na bar gyur te/ kha cig la sman med nas lhung bzed btsongs kyang khyim bdag gis ma nyos nas dus 'das par gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge

262a1('dul ba): bkrus/ kha ma bsgyur/ gsar ba btags ma thag chongs shig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mu pa las zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan
262a2('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong dag gis yo byad bcu gsum chongs shig / ces bka' stsal na/ ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pa li/ so sor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ chos gos
262a3('dul ba): 'di ni/ sbyar mar byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ bya ba zin pa yongs su spyad pa'o/ /de bzhin du stod g.yogs dang / mthang gos dang / sham thabs dang / sham thabs kyi 'theb
262a4('dul ba): dang / stod chags dang / stod chags kyi 'theb dang / gdong phyis dang / lus phyis dang / g.yan pa'i gos dang / skra bzed dang / g.yogs ma dang / ras chen te/ gos 'di ni/ yo
262a5('dul ba): byad kyi gos su byin gyis brlabs te na ba la dgos te/ bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i phyir byin gyis brlab bo/ /yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
262a6('dul ba): zhus pa| btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad bcu gsum byin gyis rlobs shig ces bka' stsal na/ de las lhag pa'i gos rnams ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
262a7('dul ba): stsal pa/ u pa li/ de ni/ slob dpon dang / /mkhan po dang / yid gcugs pa rnams la bsngos la bcang bar bya ste/ de yang 'di ltar bsngo bar bya ste/ dge slong gcig gi mdun du
262b1('dul ba): 'dug la 'di skad smros shig / dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gos 'di lhag par bsngo ste/ bsngo ba'i rigs pas ni/ mkhan po la bsngo ste/ mkhan po la yid
262b2('dul ba): gcugs pas bcang bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du lan gnyis gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /rkyang ba'i nang nas sgo gsum ba'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o// //mdor na/ bus
262b3('dul ba): pa blun la sogs pa shes/ /bcu gnyis kyi ni gang zag dang / /de bzhin rnam par dbye ba dang / /tshul bzhin pa ni gsum pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal
262b4('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gang zag du'i slar bzlog pa mi btsan/ bcom ldan 'das
262b5('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pa li/ bcu gnyis te/ bus pa dang / blun po dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na
262b6('dul ba): 'dug pa dang / spangs pa dang / tshig mi brtan pa dang / spyod lam las 'gal ba dang / tshul bzhin du mi gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o/ /yang zhus pa/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/
262b7('dul ba): byis pa lta bu nas ji tsam gyis na/ bslab pa stsal ba'i bar du lags/ u pa lis gang log par bsam pa sems pa dang / log par smra ba smra ba dang / bzlog dka' ba bzlog pa yin te/
263a1('dul ba): u pa li/ de ltar na/ byis par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ glen pa lags/ mdo sde mi 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba mi 'dzin pa/ ma lta bu mi 'dzin
263a2('dul ba): pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na/ u pa li/ glen pa yin na/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ mi gsal ba lags/ /u pa li/ mdo sde yang 'dzin/ 'dul ba yang 'dzin/ ma lta bu yang 'dzin
263a3('dul ba): mod kyi/ 'on kyang mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa'i don mi shes pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na/ u pa li/ mi gsal ba yin no/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ mi mkhas pa
263a4('dul ba): lags| u pa li/ gang mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma lta bu yang 'dzin/ de dag gi don kyang shes mod kyi/ gzhan shes par byed mi nus pa ni/ u pa li/ mi mkhas pa ste/ 'di
263a5('dul ba): tsam gyis na/ u pa li/ mi mkhas pa yin no/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ ngo tsha med pa lags/ u pa li/ de ni/ phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung bar gyur
263a6('dul ba): pa ste| u pa li/ de ni/ ngo tsha med par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ 'khon du 'dzin pa lags/ u pa li/ de ni/ khro ba dang / 'thab mo dang / /gzhan yang gang dang gang du
263a7('dul ba): 'thab pa'i sgor gyur pa ste/ u pa li/ de tsam gyis na/ 'khon du 'dzin pa'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa lags/ de ni/ u pa li/ dge
263b1('dul ba): slong gi mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa ste/ u pa li/ de tsam gyis na/ mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa'o/ /btsun pa| ji tsam gyis na/ spangs pa lags/ u pa li/ de ni/ dge
263b2('dul ba): 'dun gyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis spangs pa ste/ u pa li/ de tsam gyis na/ spangs par gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ tshig mi brtan par gyur pa lags/ u
263b3('dul ba): pa li| de ni/ tshig mi brtan par gyur pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal par smra ba'o/ /u pa li/ de tsam gyis na/ tshig mi brtan par gyur pa'o/ /
263b4('dul ba): btsun pa/ ji tsam na/ spyod lam 'gal bar gyur pa lags/ u pa li/ de ni/ dge 'dun gyi nang nas langs nas song ba'o/ /u pa li/ de ltar na/ spyod lam las 'gal bar gyur
263b5('dul ba): pa'o| |btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ mi spyod pa ni/ spyod/ dge slong gi bslab pa ni/ mi slob pa'o/ /u pa li/ de tsam

264a1('dul ba): gis slar bzlog pa la btsan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pa li/ rnam pa gsum ste/ tshul bzhin la gnas pa dang / tshig brtan pa dang /

270b1('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir spu gri'i snod chongs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi spu gri khyer te bya ba byas
270b2('dul ba): kyang spu gri blangs na/ da dung bya ba yod ces zer nas spu gri mi ster ro/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spu gri bya ba byas
270b3('dul ba): nas ma 'chang zhig / 'chang na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /spu gri ji lta ba bzhin du brdar dang / sen mo gcad pa dang / smang tsher dang / rkang pa rten pa rnams so/ /drug sde dag gis gci pa'i
270b4('dul ba): gnas su zhugs te bya ba byas kyang / da dung yang slar 'jug go /zhes smras nas dge slong lhags pa rnams 'jug tu mi ster ro/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
270b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gci ba'i gnas su zhugs te bya ba byas nas dge slong dag ma bgags shig /bgags na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /bshang pa'i sar
270b6('dul ba): yang de bzhin no/ /rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// //mdor na/ g.yog dang dus ston chen po dang / /rnyog pa can gyi chu dang ni/ /phye las rdzis dang skyo ma dang / /
270b7('dul ba): sde re ba sdus de bzhin bsgrags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
271a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na/ bdag gis sen mo dang / dbu skra'i mchod rten la dus ston chen po bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
271a2('dul ba): pa/ de ltar na/ gnang gi/ gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la dus ston gsol cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag dus ston chen po'i tshe 'dus
271a3('dul ba): nas de dag rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bzed rnams bkrus pa dang / gtsug lag khang du gnas pa dang / dge bsnyen dag gis kyang mar dang / 'bru mar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnams kyang rdzing bur
271a4('dul ba): bkrus pas na/ lhung bzed rnams dang / bum pa de rnams kyi snum dag gis chu'i steng du zhag chags par gyur te/ de la dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas chu mi 'thung ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong
271a5('dul ba): dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyi/ dkrugs la 'thungs shig /de la the tshom ma byed cig /chu de
271a6('dul ba): kho ra khor yug tu skye bo mang po dag gis dkrugs pas na/ thams cad kyang rnyog pas gang ste/ gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang mi snang bar gyur/ chu tshags kyang rnyog pas 'gags nas chu
271a7('dul ba): mi zag pa dang / de dag la gnod par gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na gdong gi gzugs
271b1('dul ba): brnyan mi snang ba der lhung bzed chung ngu'am/ snod gzhan gyis chus la shing tog ka ta ka'i 'bras bu chug ste skad cig sdod la rtogs shig dang / nges par gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang snang bar 'gyur
271b2('dul ba): ro/ /de lta bu med na zan gyi chang bu chug cig /de snum med pas zhig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phye mar gyis la der chug cig /chu ba tshwa can du gyur nas dge slong dag the
271b3('dul ba): tshom skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste des lan tshwa'i bya ba byed nus na/ byin len byos la 'thungs shig /de ste bya ba byed mi nus na/ chus la 'thungs shig /de la the
271b4('dul ba): tshom du ma byed cig / rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcas pa dgu pa'o// //mdor na/ chu dang zho las chur gyur dang / /bum pa bung pa de bzhin te/ /lag pa bsnyal nas btung ba dang //
271b5('dul ba): dge tshul pha la'ang rnam bzhir bya/ /lhung bzed dang ni gdong bkru dang / /bsod snyoms pa la rnam pa gnyis/ /rgyags dang 'bras bu me tog dag /phongs na rung gi bza' bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
271b6('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag khron pa'i nang nas chu bcus te de dag gis bcags te/ 'bras chan brul ma dang / khur
271b7('dul ba): ba'i dum bu dag byung ngo / /de dag the tshom skyes nas chag pa dang / dum bu dag kyang 'khrug par gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
272a1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyi/ phyung ste bor la tshogs shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /dge slong dag rdzing nas chu 'chu ba dang / der chu'i bum
272a2('dul ba): pa dang / sbrang rtsi'i bum pa dag bkrus pa dang / dge slong dag gis kyang lhung bzed snum can dag der bkrus so/ /de dag gis snum gyis chu'i steng zhag chags par gyur/ zho'i dum bu dag
272a3('dul ba): kyang snang bar gyur nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te ma bcus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyi/ chus shig /phyi dro mi 'thungs nas bcom
272a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thungs shig /bum pa dang / ril ba dag gi nang du mi ldugs te bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang lugs shig /dge slong dag cig

272a6('dul ba): gzhan med na/ rtogs la 'thungs shig /de dag bum pa dang ril pa'i nang du mi ldugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang lugs shig /phyi dro mi 'thungs pa

272b1('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong rnams rngo chu sgrom ni/ bkru bkru ba yin gyi/ rtogs la 'thungs shig /ril ba dang / bum pa dag tu mi ldugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang
272b2('dul ba): lugs shig / phyi dro mi 'thungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thungs shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /de bzhin du shing sgrom dang / rkyal ba'i nang na 'dug pa yang
272b3('dul ba): rtogs la 'thungs shig / phyi dro dang / ril ba dang / bum pa'i nang du'ang lugs shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /dge slong dag gis dge 'dun la chu brims pa dang / de na dge slong dag gis
272b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa/ chu rgyun lhung bzed kyi nang nas ma chad pas na/ bzhag par gyur to/ /zhes smras te/ de dag gis ma blangs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /

272b6('dul ba): zho'i chu dang / dar ba dang / rtsab mo dang / tshwa la sogs pa la rgyas par brjod do/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa las/ ba lang gi lhas su phyin pa
272b7('dul ba): dang / de dag la de na chu med de/ de dag gis zho'i chu byin pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas mi 'khru'o/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom
273a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na chu med pa der zho'i chu dang / dar ba dang bas khrus shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /dge slong dag gis ba lang rdzi
273a2('dul ba): la bum pa brnyas pa dang / de dag gis mar gyi bum pa dang / 'o ma'i bum pa dag rnyed na/ de dag the tshom skyes nas ma blangs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
273a3('dul ba): la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bum pa la rnam pa lnga ste/ bshang ba'i bum pa dang / gci ba'i bum pa dang / chang gi bum pa dang /
273a4('dul ba): 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum pa'o/ /de la snga ma gsum po ni/ ma bzhag pa yang ma gzhag cig /bzhag na ni/ rgyang ring por 'or cig /'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar
273a5('dul ba): gyi bum pa ni/ me'i nang du bsregs la de nas lci ba'i ri lu'am/ ba lang gi lci bas rung bar gyis la/ chu bcus te de snga dro dang / phyi dro yang spyod cig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig/

273b1('dul ba): la kha bkrus te gdod/ chu 'thungs shig /bum pa'i kha gab med par ma gzhag cig /de bas na/ ngas gnang gi /bum pa'i kha gab chongs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bum pa'i kha gab chongs
273b2('dul ba): shig / ces bka' stsal na/ dge slong dag gis kha gab ji lta bu bcang bar mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing las byas pa'am/ rdo las byas pa'am/ sa las byas

273b4('dul ba): ma rang lhags pa tshol la de'i nang nas 'thungs shig / de'ang med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bag yod bzhin du shing la chags pa las 'thungs shig /de'ang

273b6('dul ba): phongs pa na gnang ba de/ ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig /spyad na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod dong pa las de
273b7('dul ba): dag gis rgyags dge tshul pha dag la bskur ba dang / de dag ma theg nas de dag gis theg pa la skur cig /ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma bteg go /de ltar gyur pa dge
274a1('dul ba): slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ the gcig /dge tshul pha dag ngal nas phog ste slongs zhes smras pa dang /

274a3('dul ba): gdeg pa dang / dbab pa dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul phas ma bzung bar gdeg pa dang / dbab par ma byed cig /dge tshul pha dag gis bdag cag chad de
274a4('dul ba): ngal bso'i khyed kyis cung zhig khyer cig / ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis ma khyer ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tha gus bcings la/ tha gu'i rtse mo dge tshul phas

274a6('dul ba): dge slong 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu 'grogs te lam du zhugs pa dang / 'gron pa mang po dag rkun pos bcom pa dang / dge tshul gyis rgyags rnams bor nas bros te dong ngo / /dge
274a7('dul ba): slong dag gis rgyags khyer nas de nyid na bor zhing 'dug pa dang / 'gron pa mang po dag gis 'phags pa/ khyed kyi rgyags ni/ rkun pos ma khyer ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis
274b1('dul ba): dge tshul pha dag la dengs la rgyags longs te shog cig / ces smras pa dang / de dag skrag nas 'dong du ma btub ste/ khyed nyid ci'i phyir mi 'dong / nged cag rkun pos gsad mod ces smras pa dang /

274b3('dul ba): nas de dag ma zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig /klung brgal bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul pha
274b4('dul ba): dag la khyed nyid kyis khyer te brgal bar nus sam zhes dris la/ de ste nus zhes zer na/ legs/ de ste mi nus so/ /zhes zer na/ rgyags bdag cag gis khyer la rgol cig /de la dge slong dag
274b5('dul ba): gis rgyags dag pha rol tu bsgral bar bya na/ dge tshul phas bsgral bar gyis la brtag par gyis shig /de ste dge tshul pha yang mi nus na/ dge slong dag gis rgyags pha rol tu sgrol la de'i
274b6('dul ba): 'og tu dge tshul pha yang bsgral bar gyis shig / de ste gnyi ga nus na/ dge tshul pha dang rgyags lhan cig tu bsgral bar gyis shig /gnyis ka lhan cig tu bsgral ba dge slong rnams the tshom
274b7('dul ba): skyes nas ma zos so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom du ma byed par bza' bar gyis shig/
275a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lhung bzed du zo zhig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig gis lhung bzed bkrus nas mthe bos brdabs na/ sgra mi
275a2('dul ba): gsang nas dge slong de la the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgyu med par lan gsum du bkru bas khrus la mthe bos brdabs na sgra gsang bar byung na/ de la the tshom

275a6('dul ba): nas des phyi dro khu ba zhig 'thungs te/ nub kar lhung bzed de'i nang du skom btung zhes byas pa dang / lhung bzed kyi nang du snum langs nas de'i steng du zhag chags pa dang / dge slong de the tshom

275b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha dang rma gnyis mtshungs te rtag tu zug pas ma 'bags par mi nus mod kyi/ lan gsum du kha bkrus te chu bor ba ni/ kha bkrus pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong zhig
275b4('dul ba): gis bsod snyoms bslangs te gnas khang du bzhag nas phyi rol tu byung ba dang / khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de'i steng du zas shig blugs te bzhag pa dang / ji tsam bsod snyoms pa der slar
275b5('dul ba): 'ongs nas bsod snyoms kyi steng na zas gzhan zhig blugs par mthong ste/ de the tshom skyes nas zan ma zos so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
275b6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste byin len byed pa yod na/ byin len byos la zo zhig /de ste med na/ steng gi gsar pa de logs shig tu 'or la de la the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig/ dge slong gzhan
275b7('dul ba): zhig gis bsod snyoms blangs nas gnas khang du bzhag ste phyi rol tu song ba dang / de khyim pa zhig gis reg par mthong ste/ dge slong de the tshom skyes nas ma zos so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
276a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de la ci'i phyir reg ces dris la/ des rtswa dang / sbrang ma dag bsal pa'i phyir
